trans-unit.source: This document was podified for the 5.005_03 release of Perl 11 March 1999.
trans-unit.target: 这个文档是为1999年3月11日发布的Perl 5.005_03版本而编写的。

trans-unit.source: This document was podified for the 5.6 release of perl 11 July 2000.
trans-unit.target: 这个文档是为2000年7月11日发布的5.6版perl而编写的。

trans-unit.source: This document was revised 09-October-1996 for Perl 5.003_7.
trans-unit.target: 本文档于1996年10月9日针对Perl 5.003_7进行了修订。

trans-unit.source: This document will help you Configure, build, test and install Perl on BS2000 in the POSIX subsystem.
trans-unit.target: 本文档将帮助你在POSIX子系统中的BS2000上配置、构建、测试和安装Perl。

trans-unit.source: This document will help you Configure, build, test and install Perl on OS/390 (aka z/OS) Unix System Services.
trans-unit.target: 本文档将帮助你在OS/390(又称z/OS)Unix系统服务上配置、构建、测试和安装Perl。

trans-unit.source: This document will help you configure, make, test and install Perl on Cygwin. This document also describes features of Cygwin that will affect how Perl behaves at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 本文档将帮助你在Cygwin上配置、制作、测试和安装Perl。本文档还描述了Cygwin的特性,这些特性将影响Perl在运行时的表现。

trans-unit.source: This document will help you learn the best way to go about hacking on the Perl core C code. It covers common problems, debugging, profiling, and more.
trans-unit.target: 本文档将帮助你学习如何对Perl核心C代码进行黑客攻击的最佳方法。它涵盖了常见问题、调试、剖析等内容。

trans-unit.source: This document will try to discuss what alternatives for the deprecated features are available.
trans-unit.target: 本文档将尝试讨论被废弃的功能有哪些替代品。

trans-unit.source: This documentation describes version 0.08.
trans-unit.target: 本文档描述的是0.08版本。

trans-unit.source: This documentation is for people who want to download CPAN modules and install them on their own computer.
trans-unit.target: 本文档是为想下载CPAN模块并在自己的电脑上安装的人准备的。

trans-unit.source: This does a ref() check on the argument provided. The ref of the argument must be the same as the ref of the default value for this check to pass.
trans-unit.target: 这会对提供的参数执行 ref() 检查。参数的 ref 必须与默认值的 ref 相同，此检查才能通过。

trans-unit.source: This does a ref() check on the argument provided. The ref of the argument must be the same as the ref of the default value for this check to pass.
trans-unit.target: 这会对提供的参数进行 ref() 检查。参数的 ref 必须与默认值的 ref 相同，此检查才能通过。

trans-unit.source: This does not check for subtypes or method overloading. Use sv_isa_sv to verify an inheritance relationship in the same way as the isa operator by respecting any isa() method overloading; or sv_derived_from_sv to test directly on the actual object type.
trans-unit.target: 这不会检查子类型或方法重载。通过 sv_isa_sv 任何 isa() 方法重载，使用sv_isa_sv以与 isa 运算符相同的方式验证继承关系。或 sv_derived_from_sv 直接测试实际的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: This does not check if exists $brooklyn{tree} is true, it checks if it returns 1. Very different. Similar caveats exist for false and 0. In these cases, use ok() .
trans-unit.target: 这不会检查 exists $brooklyn{tree} 是否存在，而是检查它是否返回1。非常不同。对于false和0存在类似的警告。在这些情况下，请使用 ok() 。

trans-unit.source: This does not check if exists $brooklyn{tree} is true, it checks if it returns 1. Very different. Similar caveats exist for false and 0. In these cases, use ok().

trans-unit.source: This does not create any methods for you, it just adds the FOO constant.
trans-unit.target: 这不会为您创建任何方法，而只是添加 FOO 常量。

trans-unit.source: This does not need an interpreter context, so the definition has no pTHX , and it follows that callers don't use aTHX . (See Background and PERL_IMPLICIT_CONTEXT.)
trans-unit.target: 这不需要解释器上下文，因此该定义没有 pTHX ，因此，调用者不使用 aTHX 。（请参阅背景和PERL_IMPLICIT_CONTEXT。）

trans-unit.source: This does not work with object methods, however; all object methods have to be in the symbol table of some package to be found. See "Function Templates" in perlref for something of a work-around to this.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这不适用于对象方法。所有对象方法都必须在某个包的符号表中才能找到。有关此问题的解决方法，请参见perlref中的“功能模板”。

trans-unit.source: This does not work with object methods, however; all object methods have to be in the symbol table of some package to be found. See Function Templates in perlref for something of a work-around to this.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这不适用于对象方法。所有对象方法都必须在某个包的符号表中才能找到。有关此问题的变通方法，请参见perlref中的功能模板。

trans-unit.source: This does require you to read the entire archive in to memory first, since otherwise we wouldn't know what data to fill the copy with. (This means that you cannot use the class methods, including iter on archives that have incompatible filetypes and still expect things to work).
trans-unit.target: 这确实需要您首先将整个档案读入内存，因为否则我们将不知道用什么数据填充副本。（这意味着您不能使用类方法，包括对文件类型不兼容但仍期望其正常工作的归档文件进行 iter ）。

trans-unit.source: This does the same:
trans-unit.target: 这也是同样的道理。

trans-unit.source: This doesn't copy the underlying array:
trans-unit.target: 这不会复制底层数组。

trans-unit.source: This doesn't do anything to your input, or to your output. It only influences the way your sources are read. You can use Unicode in string literals, in identifiers (but they still have to be "word characters" according to \w ), and even in custom delimiters.
trans-unit.target: 这对您的输入或输出没有任何作用。它仅影响阅读源的方式。您可以在字符串文字，标识符（但根据 \w ，它们仍必须是“单词字符” ）甚至自定义定界符中使用Unicode 。

trans-unit.source: This doesn't do anything to your input, or to your output. It only influences the way your sources are read. You can use Unicode in string literals, in identifiers (but they still have to be "word characters" according to \w), and even in custom delimiters.
trans-unit.target: 这对您的输入或输出没有任何作用。它仅影响阅读源的方式。您可以在字符串文字，标识符（但根据 \w ，它们仍必须是“单词字符” ）甚至自定义定界符中使用Unicode 。

trans-unit.source: This doesn't mean that a my variable declared in a statically enclosing lexical scope would be invisible. Only dynamic scopes are cut off. For example, the bumpx() function below has access to the lexical $x variable because both the my and the sub occurred at the same scope, presumably file scope.
trans-unit.target: 这并不意味着在静态封闭的词法范围内声明的 my 变量将不可见。仅动态范围被切断。例如，下面的 bumpx() 函数可以访问词法$ x变量，因为 my 和 sub 都发生在同一作用域（大概是文件作用域）中。

trans-unit.source: This doesn't mean that a my variable declared in a statically enclosing lexical scope would be invisible. Only dynamic scopes are cut off. For example, the bumpx() function below has access to the lexical $x variable because both the my and the sub occurred at the same scope, presumably file scope.
trans-unit.target: 这并不意味着在静态封闭的词法范围内声明的 my 变量将是不可见的。仅动态范围被切断。例如，下面的 bumpx() 函数可以访问词法$ x变量，因为 my 和 sub 都发生在同一作用域（大概是文件作用域）中。

trans-unit.source: This doesn't really improve the legibility of this example, but it's available in case you want it. Squashing the pattern down to the compact form, we have
trans-unit.target: 这并没有真正改善这个例子的可读性,但如果你需要的话,可以使用它。把这个模式压缩成紧凑的形式,我们就有了

trans-unit.source: This doesn't work if you explicitly specify a loop variable, as in for $item (@array) . You have to use the default variable $_ .
trans-unit.target: 如果您显式指定循环变量（如 for $item (@array) ，则此方法无效。您必须使用默认变量 $_ 。

trans-unit.source: This doesn't work if you explicitly specify a loop variable, as in for $item (@array). You have to use the default variable $_.
trans-unit.target: 如果您显式指定循环变量（如 for $item (@array) ，则此方法无效。您必须使用默认变量 $_ 。

trans-unit.source: This doesn't work so cleanly for varargs functions, though, as macros imply that the number of arguments is known in advance. Instead we either need to spell them out fully, passing aTHX_ as the first argument (the Perl core tends to do this with functions like Perl_warner), or use a context-free version.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这对于varargs函数而言并不是很干净，因为宏暗示着事先知道参数的数量。取而代之的是，我们要么完全拼出它们，将 aTHX_ 作为第一个参数传递（Perl内核倾向于使用Perl_warner之类的函数来做到这一点），或者使用上下文无关的版本。

trans-unit.source: This dummy class exists to signal that the class inheriting it should be skipped when reporting exceptions from autodie. This is useful for utility classes like Path::Tiny that wish to report the location of where they were called on failure.
trans-unit.target: 该伪类的存在表明在报告来自autodie的异常时，应跳过继承该类的类。对于实用程序类，如Path :: Tiny，它们希望报告失败时被调用的位置，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: This effect can be demonstrated by setting up a test script with both forms, including a debug() subroutine to emulate typical logger() functionality.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置两种形式的测试脚本 debug() 包括一个debug（）子例程来模拟典型的 logger() 功能）来证明这种效果。

trans-unit.source: This effectively means that your source code behaves as if it were written in UTF-8 with 'use utf8 ' in effect. So even if your editor only supports Shift_JIS, for example, you can still try examples in Chapter 15 of Programming Perl, 3rd Ed..
trans-unit.target: 这实际上意味着您的源代码的行为就像是用UTF-8编写的，并且有效地 'use utf8 了“ use utf8 ”。因此，例如，即使您的编辑器仅支持Shift_JIS，您仍然可以尝试《 Programming Perl, 3rd Ed. 第15章中的示例。。

trans-unit.source: This effectively means that your source code behaves as if it were written in UTF-8 with 'use utf8' in effect. So even if your editor only supports Shift_JIS, for example, you can still try examples in Chapter 15 of Programming Perl, 3rd Ed..
trans-unit.target: 这实际上意味着您的源代码的行为就像是用UTF-8编写的，并且有效地 'use utf8 了“ use utf8 ”。因此，例如，即使您的编辑器仅支持Shift_JIS，您仍然可以尝试《 Programming Perl, 3rd Ed. 第15章中的示例。。

trans-unit.source: This empty set of prereqs is useful for accumulating new prereqs before finally dumping the whole set into a structure or string.
trans-unit.target: 这个空的prereqs集对于积累新的prereqs很有用,最后将整个集转储到一个结构或字符串中。

trans-unit.source: This enables (or disables) all of the indent, space_before and space_after (and in the future possibly more) flags in one call to generate the most readable (or most compact) form possible.
trans-unit.target: 这将在一次调用中启用（或禁用）所有 indent ， space_before 和 space_after （并且将来可能会更多）标志，以生成可能的最具可读性（或最紧凑）的形式。

trans-unit.source: This enables a trace mode and is primarily for debugging bigint or Math::BigInt.
trans-unit.target: 这可以启用跟踪模式,主要用于调试bigint或Math::BigInt。

trans-unit.source: This enables a trace mode and is primarily for debugging bignum or Math::BigInt/Math::BigFloat.
trans-unit.target: 这可以启用跟踪模式,主要用于调试bignum或Math::BigInt/Math::BigFloat。

trans-unit.source: This enables aliasing via assignment to references:
trans-unit.target: 这可以通过对引用的赋值实现别名。

trans-unit.source: This enables debugging output when calling commandline utilities to fetch files. This also enables Carp::longmess errors, instead of the regular carp errors.
trans-unit.target: 这样可以在调用命令行实用程序以提取文件时调试输出。这也启用了 Carp::longmess 错误，而不是常规的 carp 错误。

trans-unit.source: This enables declaration of subroutines via my sub foo , state sub foo and our sub foo syntax. See Lexical Subroutines in perlsub for details.
trans-unit.target: 这样可以通过 my sub foo ， state sub foo 和 our sub foo 语法声明子程序。有关详细信息，请参见perlsub中的词法子例程。

trans-unit.source: This enables the programmer to do operations that combine functionalities that are available in the shell.
trans-unit.target: 这样,程序员就可以进行结合shell中现有功能的操作。

trans-unit.source: This enables unpacking of subroutine arguments into lexical variables by syntax such as
trans-unit.target: 这使得子程序的参数可以通过如下语法解包成词汇变量

trans-unit.source: This entry can be used to store a C structure (the number of bytes to be copied is calculated using the C sizeof function) and can be used as an alternative to T_PTRREF without having to worry about a memory leak (since Perl will clean up the SV).
trans-unit.target: 该条目可用于存储C结构（要复制的字节数是使用C sizeof 函数计算的），并且可以用作T_PTRREF的替代，而不必担心内存泄漏（因为Perl会清理内存SV）。

trans-unit.source: This entry describes the bug tracking system for this distribution. It is a Map with the following valid keys:
trans-unit.target: 这个条目描述了这个发行版的错误跟踪系统。它是一个地图,有以下有效的键。

trans-unit.source: This entry describes the source control repository for this distribution. It is a Map with the following valid keys:
trans-unit.target: 这个条目描述了这个发行版的源代码控制库。它是一个Map,有效键如下。

trans-unit.source: This entry is required and has the same structure as that of the "prereqs" key. It provides a list of package requirements that must be satisfied for the feature to be supported or enabled.
trans-unit.target: 该条目是必需的，并且具有与 "prereqs" 键相同的结构。它提供了要支持或启用该功能必须满足的软件包要求的列表。

trans-unit.source: This environment variable allows the user to specify custom color aliases that will be understood by color(), colored(), and colorvalid(). None of the other functions will be affected, and no new color constants will be created. The custom colors are aliases for existing color names; no new escape sequences can be introduced. Only alphanumerics, ., _ , and - are allowed in alias names.
trans-unit.target: 此环境变量允许用户指定将由color（），colored（）和colorvalid（）理解的自定义颜色别名。其他功能均不会受到影响，也不会创建新的颜色常数。自定义颜色是现有颜色名称的别名。无法引入新的转义序列。仅字母数字， . ， _ 和 - 允许使用别名。

trans-unit.source: This environment variable allows the user to specify custom color aliases that will be understood by color(), colored(), and colorvalid(). None of the other functions will be affected, and no new color constants will be created. The custom colors are aliases for existing color names; no new escape sequences can be introduced. Only alphanumerics, ., _, and - are allowed in alias names.
trans-unit.target: 该环境变量允许用户指定自定义颜色别名，这些别名将由color（），colored（）和colorvalid（）理解。其他功能均不会受到影响，也不会创建新的颜色常数。自定义颜色是现有颜色名称的别名。无法引入新的转义序列。仅字母数字， . ， _ 和 - 允许使用别名。

trans-unit.source: This environment variable is read and applied when the Term::ANSIColor module is loaded and is then subsequently ignored. Changes to ANSI_COLORS_ALIASES after the module is loaded will have no effect. See coloralias() for an equivalent facility that can be used at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 这个环境变量在Term::ANSIColor模块加载时被读取并应用,随后被忽略。在模块加载后对ANSI_COLORS_ALIASES的更改将不会有任何影响。参见coloralias()以获得一个可以在运行时使用的等价设施。

trans-unit.source: This environment variable, available starting in Perl v5.20, if set (to any value), tells Perl to not use the rest of the environment variables to initialize with. Instead, Perl uses whatever the current locale settings are. This is particularly useful in embedded environments, see "Using embedded Perl with POSIX locales" in perlembed.
trans-unit.target: 如果将Perl v5.20设置为任何值，则此环境变量可从Perl v5.20开始使用，它告诉Perl不要使用其余的环境变量进行初始化。取而代之的是，Perl使用任何当前的语言环境设置。这在嵌入式环境中特别有用，请参阅perlembed中的“在POSIX语言环境中使用嵌入式Perl”。

trans-unit.source: This environment variable, available starting in Perl v5.20, if set (to any value), tells Perl to not use the rest of the environment variables to initialize with. Instead, Perl uses whatever the current locale settings are. This is particularly useful in embedded environments, see Using embedded Perl with POSIX locales in perlembed.
trans-unit.target: 如果将Perl v5.20设置为任何值，则此环境变量可从Perl v5.20开始使用，它告诉Perl不要使用其余的环境变量进行初始化。取而代之的是，Perl使用任何当前的语言环境设置。这在嵌入式环境中特别有用，请参阅在perlembed中将嵌入式Perl与POSIX语言环境一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This error is generated when it is not possible to find the local definitions for error codes, due to the uncommon structure of the Synology file system.
trans-unit.target: 由于 Synology 文件系统的结构不常见,当无法找到错误代码的本地定义时,就会产生此错误。

trans-unit.source: This error was fixed in the Perl development git for version 5.19, commit 7a8f1212e5482613c8a5b0402528e3105b26ff24.
trans-unit.target: 这个错误在5.19版本的Perl开发git中得到了修正,提交7a8f1212e5482613c8a5b0402528e3105b26ff24。

trans-unit.source: This evaluates STRING as perl code inside the compartment.
trans-unit.target: 这将STRING作为perl代码在车厢内进行评估。

trans-unit.source: This evaluates the contents of file FILENAME inside the compartment. It uses the same rules as perl's built-in do to locate the file, poossibly using @INC.
trans-unit.target: 这将评估隔离专区中文件FILENAME的内容。它使用相同的规则Perl的内置 do 找到该文件，poossibly使用 @INC 。

trans-unit.source: This evaluates the contents of file FILENAME inside the compartment. See above documentation on the reval method for further details.
trans-unit.target: 这将评估隔离专区中文件FILENAME的内容。有关更多详细信息，请参见上述有关reval方法的文档。

trans-unit.source: This evaluates to true if and only if the string in the variable $foo contains somewhere in it, the sequence of characters "a", "b", then "c". (The =~ m, or match operator, is described in "m/PATTERN/msixpodualngc" in perlop.)
trans-unit.target: 当且仅当变量 $foo 中的字符串在其中包含字符“ a”，“ b”，然后“ c”的序列时，此表达式的值为true 。（ =~ m 〜m或匹配运算符在perlop的“ m / PATTERN / msixpodualngc”中进行了描述。）

trans-unit.source: This event has no data of its own. This event is sent out by the IPC system when the main process/thread is ready to end.
trans-unit.target: 该事件没有自己的数据。该事件由IPC系统在主进程/线程准备结束时发出。

trans-unit.source: This event is used if a TAP formatter wishes to set a version.
trans-unit.target: 如果TAP格式化器希望设置一个版本,则使用该事件。

trans-unit.source: This example added quite a few new concepts. We'll take them one at a time.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子增加了不少新概念。我们逐一来看看。

trans-unit.source: This example does not include any retries and may consequently fail to contact a reachable host. The most prominent reason for this is congestion of the queues on the sending host if the number of hosts to contact is sufficiently large.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子不包括任何重试,因此可能无法联系到可到达的主机。最主要的原因是,如果要联系的主机数量足够多,发送主机上的队列就会出现拥堵。

trans-unit.source: This example fails because baz() refers to the package/global subroutine baz, not the lexical subroutine currently being defined.
trans-unit.target: 此示例失败，因为 baz() 引用了package / global子例程 baz ，而不是当前正在定义的词法子例程。

trans-unit.source: This example is aborted at compile time as we use the attribute "Test" which isn't allowed. MODIFY_CODE_ATTRIBUTES returns a list that contains a single element ('Test').
trans-unit.target: 此示例在编译时中止，因为我们使用了不允许的属性“ Test”。 MODIFY_CODE_ATTRIBUTES 返回包含单个元素的列表（“测试”）。

trans-unit.source: This example is fairly trivial; for more complex cases and a deeper explanation, see the links in the "SEE ALSO" section.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子很简单。有关更复杂的情况和更深入的说明，请参见“另请参阅”部分中的链接。

trans-unit.source: This example prints the mail domain name of the SMTP server known as mailhost:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子打印的是名为mailhost的SMTP服务器的邮件域名。

trans-unit.source: This example runs. At compile time MODIFY_CODE_ATTRIBUTES is called. In that subroutine, we check if any attribute is disallowed and we return a list of these "bad attributes".
trans-unit.target: 此示例运行。在编译时，将调用 MODIFY_CODE_ATTRIBUTES 。在该子例程中，我们检查是否不允许任何属性，并返回这些“不良属性”的列表。

trans-unit.source: This example sends a single assertion, a note (comment for stdout in Test::Builder talk) and sets the plan to 1.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子发送一个单一的断言,一个注释(Test::Builder talk中的stdout注释),并将计划设置为1。

trans-unit.source: This example sends a small message to the postmaster at the SMTP server known as mailhost:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子在名为mailhost的SMTP服务器上向邮递员发送一个小消息。

trans-unit.source: This example separates a text into fields which are quote delimited, curly bracketed, and anything else. The delimited and bracketed parts are also blessed to identify them (the "anything else" is unblessed):
trans-unit.target: 这个例子将一个文本分为引号分隔的字段、大括号分隔的字段和其他任何字段。分界线和括号内的部分也是有祝福的,以便识别它们("其他任何东西 "是没有祝福的)。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to create a database, add key/value pairs to the database, delete keys/value pairs and finally how to enumerate the contents of the database.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了如何创建数据库、向数据库添加键/值对、删除键/值对以及最后如何枚举数据库的内容。

trans-unit.source: This example shows rewriting weights. rewrite is allowed to affect code points, weights, and the name.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示重写权重。允许 rewrite 以影响代码点，权重和名称。

trans-unit.source: This example shows two calls that should have the same effect:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子显示了两个应该具有相同效果的调用。

trans-unit.source: This example takes a regular expression from the argument list and prints the lines of input that match it:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子从参数列表中提取一个正则表达式,并打印与之匹配的输入行。

trans-unit.target: 这个例子将$directory中稍加修改的内容作为一个哈希处理。修改后的键是

trans-unit.target: 这个例子将与以下Perl语句一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This example will set the time to midnight on the same date which $t had previously. Allowed values for the "to" parameter are: "year", "quarter", "month", "day", "hour", "minute" and "second".
trans-unit.target: 本示例将时间设置为 $t 之前的同一天的午夜。“ to”参数的允许值为：“年”，“季度”，“月”，“天”，“小时”，“分钟”和“秒”。

trans-unit.source: This example works on many platforms that have a shell compatible with Bourne shell:
trans-unit.target: 这个例子适用于许多与Bourne shell兼容的平台。

trans-unit.source: This experimental attribute, introduced in Perl 5.22, only applies to anonymous subroutines. It causes the subroutine to be called as soon as the sub expression is evaluated. The return value is captured and turned into a constant subroutine.
trans-unit.target: Perl 5.22中引入的该实验属性仅适用于匿名子例程。它使子例程在计算 sub 表达式后立即被调用。捕获返回值并将其转换为常量子例程。

trans-unit.source: This experimental attribute, introduced in Perl 5.22, only applies to anonymous subroutines. It causes the subroutine to be called as soon as the sub expression is evaluated. The return value is captured and turned into a constant subroutine.
trans-unit.target: Perl 5.22中引入的该实验属性仅适用于匿名子例程。它使子例程在 sub 表达式被求值后立即被调用。捕获返回值并将其转换为常量子例程。

trans-unit.source: This experimental feature has been added to begin to implement https://www.unicode.org/reports/tr18/#Wildcard_Properties. Using it will raise a (default-on) warning in the experimental::uniprop_wildcards category. We reserve the right to change its operation as we gain experience.
trans-unit.target: 已添加此实验功能以开始实施https://www.unicode.org/reports/tr18/#Wildcard_Properties。使用它会在 experimental::uniprop_wildcards 类别中引发（默认开启）警告。我们保留随着经验积累而改变其运作的权利。

trans-unit.source: This exposes the VMS C library realpath function where available. It will always return a Unix format specification.
trans-unit.target: 这将在可用的地方公开VMS C库 realpath 函数。它将始终返回Unix格式规范。

trans-unit.source: This expression is actually equivalent to $x & ($y == 0) , due to the higher precedence of == . This is probably not what you want. (If you really meant to write this, disable the warning, or, better, put the parentheses explicitly and write $x & ($y == 0) ).
trans-unit.target: 由于 == 的优先级较高，因此该表达式实际上等效于 $x & ($y == 0) 。这可能不是您想要的。（如果确实要编写此代码，请禁用警告，或者更好的方法是，将括号显式地写入 $x & ($y == 0) ）。

trans-unit.source: This expression is actually equivalent to $x & ($y == 0), due to the higher precedence of ==. This is probably not what you want. (If you really meant to write this, disable the warning, or, better, put the parentheses explicitly and write $x & ($y == 0)).
trans-unit.target: 由于 == 的优先级较高，因此该表达式实际上等效于 $x & ($y == 0) 。这可能不是您想要的。（如果确实要编写此代码，请禁用警告，或者更好的方法是，将括号显式地写入 $x & ($y == 0) ）。

trans-unit.source: This extension is somewhat contrived. It is based on the code in the previous example. It calls the statfs function multiple times, accepting a reference to an array of filenames as input, and returning a reference to an array of hashes containing the data for each of the filesystems.
trans-unit.target: 这个扩展有些造作。它是基于前面例子中的代码。它多次调用 statfs 函数,接受一个文件名数组的引用作为输入,并返回一个包含每个文件系统数据的哈希数组的引用。

trans-unit.source: This extension is very Unix-oriented (struct statfs and the statfs system call). If you are not running on a Unix system, you can substitute for statfs any other function that returns multiple values, you can hard-code values to be returned to the caller (although this will be a bit harder to test the error case), or you can simply not do this example. If you change the XSUB, be sure to fix the test cases to match the changes.
trans-unit.target: 这个扩展是非常面向Unix的(struct statfs和statfs系统调用)。如果你不是在Unix系统上运行,你可以用其他任何返回多个值的函数来代替statfs,你可以硬编码返回给调用者的值(尽管这对测试错误情况会有点困难),或者你可以干脆不做这个例子。如果你改变了XSUB,一定要修正测试用例,使之符合变化。

trans-unit.source: This facet appears in a list instead of being a single item.
trans-unit.target: 这个面会出现在列表中,而不是单个项目。

trans-unit.source: This facet can contain any random meta-data that has been attached to the event.
trans-unit.target: 这个方面可以包含任何附加到事件上的随机元数据。

trans-unit.source: This facet contains information related to when and where the event was generated. This is how the test file and line number of a failure is known. This facet can also help you to tell if tests are related.
trans-unit.target: 这个方面包含了事件产生的时间和地点的相关信息。这就是如何知道失败的测试文件和行号。这个方面也可以帮助你判断测试是否相关。

trans-unit.source: This facet contains nested events and similar details for subtests. In this facet the details field will typically be the name of the subtest.
trans-unit.target: 此方面包含嵌套事件和子测试的类似详细信息。在这个方面中， details 字段通常是子测试的名称。

trans-unit.source: This facet has information about the event, such as event package.
trans-unit.target: 这个方面有关于活动的信息,比如活动套餐。

trans-unit.source: This facet has the hash key 'errors', and is a list of facets instead of a single item.
trans-unit.target: 此构面具有哈希键 'errors' ，并且是构面列表，而不是单个项。

trans-unit.source: This facet is a list type, you can add as many items as needed.
trans-unit.target: 这个面是一个列表类型,你可以根据需要添加任意多的项目。

trans-unit.source: This facet is used if an assertion was made. The details field of this facet is the description of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 如果作出断言，则使用此构面。此方面的 details 字段是断言的描述。

trans-unit.source: This facet is used to dictate how the event should be rendered by the standard test2 rendering tools. If this facet is present then ONLY what is specified by it will be rendered. It is assumed that anything important or note-worthy will be present here, no other facets will be considered for rendering/display.
trans-unit.target: 这个方面是用来决定标准test2渲染工具应该如何渲染事件。如果这个方面存在,那么只有它所指定的内容才会被渲染。假设任何重要的或有价值的东西都会出现在这里,没有其他方面会被考虑渲染/显示。

trans-unit.source: This facet is used to tell the Test2::Event::Hub about special actions the event causes. Things like halting all testing, terminating the current test, etc. In this facet the details field explains why any special action was taken.
trans-unit.target: 此构面用于告知Test2 :: Event :: Hub有关事件导致的特殊操作的信息。诸如停止所有测试，终止当前测试等操作。在此方面中， details 字段说明了为什么采取任何特殊措施。

trans-unit.source: This facet is used when an event contains other events, such as a subtest.
trans-unit.target: 当一个事件包含其他事件(如子测试)时,就会用到这个方面。

trans-unit.source: This facet is used when an event needs to convey errors.
trans-unit.target: 当一个事件需要传达错误时,就会用到这个方面。

trans-unit.source: This facet is used when the event needs to give instructions to the Test2 internals.
trans-unit.target: 当事件需要向Test2内部发出指令时,就会用到这个方面。

trans-unit.source: This facet represents messages intended for humans that will help them either understand a result, or diagnose a failure.
trans-unit.target: 这个方面代表了针对人类的信息,这些信息将帮助人类理解一个结果,或者诊断一个故障。

trans-unit.source: This facet tells the system that a plan has been set. The details field of this is usually left empty, but when present explains why the plan is what it is, this is most useful if the plan is to skip-all.
trans-unit.target: 此方面告诉系统已设置计划。它的 details 字段通常保留为空，但是如果存在，则说明计划是什么原因，如果计划要全部跳过，这将非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This fails because the open() makes STDERR go to where STDOUT was going at the time of the open(). The backticks then make STDOUT go to a string, but don't change STDERR (which still goes to the old STDOUT).
trans-unit.target: 失败的原因是 open() 让STDERR转至STDOUT原本打算在家的时间 open() 。然后，反引号使STDOUT转到字符串，但不要更改STDERR（仍将其转到旧的STDOUT）。

trans-unit.source: This fails because the open() makes STDERR go to where STDOUT was going at the time of the open(). The backticks then make STDOUT go to a string, but don't change STDERR (which still goes to the old STDOUT).
trans-unit.target: 失败的原因是 open() 让STDERR转至STDOUT原本打算在家的时间 open() 。然后，反引号使STDOUT转到字符串，但不要更改STDERR（仍将其转到旧的STDOUT）。

trans-unit.source: This failure does not seem to cause any problems. With older gcc versions, "parse error" is reported instead of "missing binary operator".
trans-unit.target: 这个故障似乎没有引起任何问题。在旧版本的gcc中,报告的是 "parse error "而不是 "missing binary operator"。

trans-unit.source: This feature (introduced in Perl 5.10) significantly extends the power of Perl's pattern matching. By referring to some other capture group anywhere in the pattern with the construct (?group-ref), the
trans-unit.target: 此功能（在Perl 5.10中引入）大大扩展了Perl模式匹配的功能。通过使用构造 (?group-ref) 引用模式中任何位置的其他捕获组，

trans-unit.source: This feature (introduced in Perl 5.10) significantly extends the power of Perl's pattern matching. By referring to some other capture group anywhere in the pattern with the construct (?group-ref), the
trans-unit.target: 此功能（在Perl 5.10中引入）大大扩展了Perl模式匹配的功能。通过使用构造 (?group-ref) 在模式中的任何地方引用其他捕获组，

trans-unit.source: This feature allows code like this to work :
trans-unit.target: 这个功能可以让这样的代码工作。

trans-unit.source: This feature allows the use of indirect object syntax for method calls, e.g. new Foo 1, 2;. It is enabled by default, but can be turned off to disallow indirect object syntax.
trans-unit.target: 此功能允许对方法调用使用间接对象​​语法，例如， new Foo 1, 2; 。默认情况下启用它，但可以关闭以禁止间接对象语法。

trans-unit.source: This feature hasn't been tested with multiple threads, but it will only show the backtrace of the thread doing the backtracing.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能还没有经过多线程的测试,但它只会显示做回溯的线程的回溯。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available from Perl 5.16 onwards.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.16开始就有了。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available from Perl 5.18 onwards.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.18开始就有了。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available from Perl 5.18 onwards. From Perl 5.18 to 5.24, it was classed as experimental, and Perl emitted a warning for its usage, except when explicitly disabled:
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.18开始就可以使用。从Perl 5.18到5.24,它被归为实验性的,除非明确地禁用,否则Perl会对它的使用发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available from Perl 5.20 onwards.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.20开始就有了。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available from Perl 5.20 onwards. In Perl 5.20 and 5.22, it was classed as experimental, and Perl emitted a warning for its usage, except when explicitly disabled:
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.20开始就可以使用。在 Perl 5.20 和 5.22 中,它被归类为实验性的,除非明确地禁用,否则 Perl 会对它的使用发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available from Perl 5.22 onwards.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.22开始就有了。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available from Perl 5.22 onwards. Starting in Perl 5.28, use v5.28 will enable the feature. Before 5.28, it was still experimental and would emit a warning in the "experimental::bitwise" category.
trans-unit.target: 从Perl 5.22开始可以使用此功能。从Perl 5.28开始， use v5.28 将启用该功能。在5.28之前，它仍处于试验阶段，并且会在“ experimental :: bitwise”类别中发出警告。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available from Perl 5.26 onwards.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.26开始就有了。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available from Perl 5.32 onwards.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.32开始就有了。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available starting with Perl 5.10.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.10开始提供。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available starting with Perl 5.12; was almost fully implemented in Perl 5.14; and extended in Perl 5.16 to cover quotemeta.
trans-unit.target: 从Perl 5.12开始可以使用此功能。在Perl 5.14中几乎完全实现；在Perl 5.16中进行了扩展，以涵盖 quotemeta 。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available starting with Perl 5.12; was almost fully implemented in Perl 5.14; and extended in Perl 5.16 to cover quotemeta; was extended further in Perl 5.26 to cover the range operator; and was extended again in Perl 5.28 to cover special-cased whitespace splitting.
trans-unit.target: 从Perl 5.12开始可以使用此功能。在Perl 5.14中几乎完全实现；并在Perl 5.16中扩展到包括 quotemeta ; 在Perl 5.26中进一步扩展了范围运算符; 在Perl 5.28中又进行了扩展，以涵盖特殊情况下的空格分割。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available starting with Perl 5.16.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能从Perl 5.16开始提供。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available under this name from Perl 5.32 onwards. In previous versions, it was simply on all the time. To disallow (or warn on) indirect object syntax on older Perls, see the indirect CPAN module.
trans-unit.target: 从Perl 5.32开始，可以使用此功能使用此功能。在以前的版本中，它一直都在运行。要在较旧的Perls上禁止（或警告）间接对象语法，请参见间接CPAN模块。

trans-unit.source: This feature is available under this name starting with Perl 5.16. In previous versions, it was simply on all the time, and this pragma knew nothing about it.
trans-unit.target: 从Perl 5.16开始,这个功能就以这个名字出现了。在以前的版本中,它只是一直处于开启状态,而这个pragma对它一无所知。

trans-unit.source: This feature is enabled by 'importing' the non-existent symbol 'verbose'. You would typically enable it by saying
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是通过 "导入 "不存在的符号 "verbose "来启用的。通常您可以通过以下方式启用它

trans-unit.source: This feature is implemented as a new op type, OP_CUSTOM . The Perl core does not "know" anything special about this op type, and so it will not be involved in any optimizations. This also means that you can define your custom ops to be any op structure -- unary, binary, list and so on -- you like.
trans-unit.target: 此功能实现为新的op类型 OP_CUSTOM 。Perl内核不“知道”关于此op类型的任何特殊信息，因此它不会参与任何优化。这也意味着您可以将自定义操作定义为您喜欢的任何操作结构-一元，二进制，列表等。

trans-unit.source: This feature is implemented as a new op type, OP_CUSTOM. The Perl core does not "know" anything special about this op type, and so it will not be involved in any optimizations. This also means that you can define your custom ops to be any op structure -- unary, binary, list and so on -- you like.
trans-unit.target: 此功能实现为新的op类型 OP_CUSTOM 。 Perl内核不“知道”有关此op类型的任何特殊信息，因此它不会参与任何优化。这也意味着您可以将自定义操作定义为您喜欢的任何操作结构-一元，二进制，列表等。

trans-unit.source: This feature is not available when the left-hand side is prefixed by Is_, nor for any form that is marked as "Discouraged" in "Discouraged" in perluniprops.
trans-unit.target: 当左侧以 Is_ 为前缀时，或者在perluniprops的“ Discouraged ”中标记为“ Discouraged”的任何形式时，此功能均不可用。

trans-unit.source: This feature is useful when processing a file format that encapsulates a compressed data stream (e.g. gzip, zip) and there is useful data immediately after the deflation stream.
trans-unit.target: 当处理封装压缩数据流(如gzip、zip)的文件格式时,这个功能很有用,而且在放气流之后立即有有用的数据。

trans-unit.source: This feature is useful when processing a file format that encapsulates a compressed data stream (e.g. gzip, zip).
trans-unit.target: 该功能在处理封装压缩数据流的文件格式(如gzip、zip)时非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This feature makes these:
trans-unit.target: 这个功能使得这些。

trans-unit.source: This feature requires configuration option permute, see section "Configuring Getopt::Long".
trans-unit.target: 此功能需要配置选项permute，请参阅“配置Getopt :: Long”部分。

trans-unit.source: This feature requires configuration option permute, see section Configuring Getopt::Long.
trans-unit.target: 此功能需要配置选项permute，请参阅“ 配置Getopt :: Long”部分。

trans-unit.source: This feature supported the legacy $[ variable. See "$[" in perlvar. It was on by default but disabled under use v5.16 (see "IMPLICIT LOADING", below) and unavailable since perl 5.30.
trans-unit.target: 此功能支持旧版 $[ 变量。请参见perlvar中的“ $ [”。它默认情况下处于启用状态，但在 use v5.16 禁用（请参阅下面的“ IMPLICIT LOADING”，并且自perl 5.30起不可用）。

trans-unit.source: This feature supports the legacy $[ variable. See $[ in perlvar and arybase. It is on by default but disabled under use v5.16 (see IMPLICIT LOADING, below).
trans-unit.target: 此功能支持旧版 $[ 变量。请参阅$ [在perlvar和arybase中。它默认情况下处于启用状态，但在 use v5.16 禁用（请参见下面的“ 隐式加载”）。

trans-unit.source: This feature was inspired by, and small portions of code copied from, ExtUtils::MakeMaker::BigHelper. Hopefully this feature will render that module mainly obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此功能的灵感来自于ExtUtils :: MakeMaker :: BigHelper以及从中复制的一小部分代码。希望此功能将使该模块主要过时。

trans-unit.source: This feature, available starting in v5.12, matches any character that is not a newline. It is a short-hand for writing [^\n], and is identical to the . metasymbol, except under the /s flag, which changes the meaning of ., but not \N .
trans-unit.target: 此功能从v5.12开始可用，它匹配不是换行符的任何字符。它是写 [^\n] 的简写，与相同 . 元符号，但 /s 标志下的符号会更改的含义 . ，但不是 \N 。

trans-unit.source: This feature, available starting in v5.12, matches any character that is not a newline. It is a short-hand for writing [^\n], and is identical to the . metasymbol, except under the /s flag, which changes the meaning of ., but not \N.
trans-unit.target: 此功能从v5.12开始可用，它与不是换行符的任何字符匹配。它是写 [^\n] 的简写，与相同 . 元符号，但 /s 标志下的符号会更改的含义 . ，但不是 \N 。

trans-unit.source: This field defaults to the time the IO::Compress::Gzip object was created if this option is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此选项，则此字段默认为创建 IO::Compress::Gzip 对象的时间。

trans-unit.source: This field defaults to the time the IO::Compress::Zip object was created if this option is not specified and the $input parameter is not a filename.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此选项并且 $input 参数不是文件名，则该字段默认为创建 IO::Compress::Zip 对象的时间。

trans-unit.source: This field describes resources related to this distribution.
trans-unit.target: 该字段描述了与这一分布有关的资源。

trans-unit.source: This field explicitly does not indicate whether installation may be safely performed without using a Makefile or Build file, as there may be special files to install or custom installation targets (e.g. for dual-life modules that exist on CPAN as well as in the Perl core). This field only defines whether or not prerequisites are exactly as given in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 该字段明确地不指示是否可以不使用Makefile或Build文件来安全地执行安装，因为可能存在要安装的特殊文件或自定义安装目标（例如，针对CPAN和Perl核心中存在的双寿命模块） ）。该字段仅定义前提条件是否完全与元数据中给定的条件相同。

trans-unit.source: This field gives the version of the distribution to which the metadata structure refers.
trans-unit.target: 该字段给出了元数据结构所指向的发布版本。

trans-unit.source: This field has been renamed to "no_index".
trans-unit.target: 此字段已重命名为“ no_index”。

trans-unit.source: This field indicated 'module' or 'script' but was considered meaningless, since many distributions are hybrids of several kinds of things.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段表示 "模块 "或 "脚本",但被认为是没有意义的,因为许多发行版是几种东西的混合体。

trans-unit.source: This field indicates the tool that was used to create this metadata. There are no defined semantics for this field, but it is traditional to use a string in the form "Generating::Package version 1.23" or the author's name, if the file was generated by hand.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段表示用来创建元数据的工具。这个字段没有定义的语义,但传统的做法是使用 "Generating::Package version 1.23 "这样的字符串,如果文件是手工生成的,则使用作者的名字。

trans-unit.source: This field indicates the version of the CPAN Meta Spec that should be used to interpret the metadata. Consumers must check this key as soon as possible and abort further metadata processing if the meta-spec version is not supported by the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 此字段表示应使用CPAN元规格的版本来解释元数据。消费者必须尽快检查这个键,如果消费者不支持元规格版本,则放弃进一步的元数据处理。

trans-unit.source: This field is basically meaningless, and tools (like Module::Build or MakeMaker) will likely stop generating it in the future.
trans-unit.target: 这个字段基本上是没有意义的,工具(如Module::Build或MakeMaker)将来可能会停止生成它。

trans-unit.source: This field is required. It must contain a Unix-style relative file path from the root of the distribution directory to a file that contains or generates the package. It may be given as META.yml or META.json to claim a package for indexing without needing a *.pm.
trans-unit.target: 此字段是必需的。它必须包含从分发目录的根到包含或生成软件包的文件的Unix样式的相对文件路径。可以将其 META.yml 为META.yml或 META.json 来声明用于索引的包，而无需 *.pm 。

trans-unit.source: This field is the name of the distribution. This is often created by taking the "main package" in the distribution and changing :: to -, but the name may be completely unrelated to the packages within the distribution. For example, LWP::UserAgent is distributed as part of the distribution name "libwww-perl".
trans-unit.target: 此字段是分发的名称。这通常是通过在分发中采用“主包”并将 :: 更改为 - 来创建的，但该名称可能与分发中的包完全无关。例如，LWP :: UserAgent作为分发名称“ libwww-perl”的一部分进行分发。

trans-unit.source: This field points at a reg_data structure, which is defined as follows
trans-unit.target: 该字段指向 reg_data 结构，其定义如下

trans-unit.source: This field points at a regexp_engine structure which contains pointers to the subroutines that are to be used for performing a match. It is the compiling routine's responsibility to populate this field before returning the regexp object.
trans-unit.target: 该字段指向 regexp_engine 结构，该结构包含用于执行匹配的子例程的指针。在返回regexp对象之前，填充此字段是编译例程的职责。

trans-unit.source: This field provides a general contact list independent of other structured fields provided within the "resources" field, such as bugtracker. The addressee(s) can be contacted for any purpose including but not limited to (security) problems with the distribution, questions about the distribution or bugs in the distribution.
trans-unit.target: 此字段提供独立于“资源”字段中提供的其他结构化字段的独立联系人列表，例如 bugtracker 。可以出于任何目的联系收件人，包括但不限于分发的（安全）问题，有关分发的问题或分发中的错误。

trans-unit.source: This field provides the release status of this distribution. If the version field contains an underscore character, then release_statusmust not be "stable."
trans-unit.target: 该字段提供此发行版的发行状态。如果 version 字段包含下划线字符，则 release_status 不得为“稳定”。

trans-unit.source: This field should be set to a true value if the distribution performs some dynamic configuration (asking questions, sensing the environment, etc.) as part of its configuration. This field should be set to a false value to indicate that prerequisites included in metadata may be considered final and valid for static analysis.
trans-unit.target: 如果发行版作为其配置的一部分执行一些动态配置(提问、感知环境等),则应将此字段设置为真值。此字段应设置为假值,以表明元数据中包含的先决条件可被视为最终的和有效的静态分析。

trans-unit.source: This file adds no new information not already present in other files
trans-unit.target: 本文件没有添加其他文件中没有的新信息。

trans-unit.source: This file came from the "IO-stringy" Perl5 toolkit.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件来自 "IO-stringy "Perl5工具包。

trans-unit.source: This file contains instructions how to build Perl for Haiku and lists known problems.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件包含了如何构建Perl for Haiku的说明,并列出了已知的问题。

trans-unit.source: This file contains most of the documentation of the perl public API, as generated by
trans-unit.target: 这个文件包含了大部分的perl公共API的文档,是由

trans-unit.source: This file contains notes for building perl on the Stratus OpenVOS operating system. Perl is a scripting or macro language that is popular on many systems. See perlbook for a number of good books on Perl.
trans-unit.target: 该文件包含在Stratus OpenVOS操作系统上构建perl的说明。Perl是一种脚本或宏语言，在许多系统上都很流行。有关Perl的许多优秀书籍，请参见perlbook。

trans-unit.source: This file contains notes for building perl on the Stratus OpenVOS operating system. Perl is a scripting or macro language that is popular on many systems. See perlbook for a number of good books on Perl.
trans-unit.target: 该文件包含在Stratus OpenVOS操作系统上构建perl的说明。Perl是一种脚本或宏语言，在许多系统上都很流行。有关Perl的许多优秀书籍，请参见perlbook。

trans-unit.source: This file contains the documentation of the perl public API generated by
trans-unit.target: 这个文件包含了由下列文件生成的perl公共API的文档。

trans-unit.source: This file gives instructions for building Perl 5.7 and above, and also Perl modules for NetWare. Before you start, you may want to read the README file found in the top level directory into which the Perl source code distribution was extracted. Make sure you read and understand the terms under which the software is being distributed.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件给出了构建Perl 5.7及以上版本的说明,以及NetWare的Perl模块。在您开始之前,您可能需要阅读在解压 Perl 源代码发行版的顶层目录中找到的 README 文件。确保你阅读并理解软件发布的条款。

trans-unit.source: This file gives the instructions for building Perl5.8 and above for WinCE. Please read and understand the terms under which this software is distributed.
trans-unit.target: 本文件给出了为WinCE构建Perl5.8及以上版本的说明。请阅读并理解本软件的发布条款。

trans-unit.source: This file is the autogenerated documentation of functions in the Perl interpreter that are documented using Perl's internal documentation format but are not marked as part of the Perl API. In other words, they are not for use in extensions!
trans-unit.target: 该文件是Perl解释器中功能的自动生成的文档，这些文档是使用Perl的内部文档格式记录的，但未标记为Perl API的一部分。换句话说，它们不用于扩展！

trans-unit.source: This file lists everyone who's contributed to Perl. If you submit a patch, you should add your name to this file as part of the patch.
trans-unit.target: 这个文件列出了所有对 Perl 有贡献的人。如果你提交了一个补丁,你应该把你的名字作为补丁的一部分加入到这个文件中。

trans-unit.source: This file resides somewhere deep in the location you installed your perl library, find it out by
trans-unit.target: 这个文件位于你安装perl库的某个深处,通过以下方法找到它

trans-unit.source: This file will get parsed, and produce a maybe empty @DynaLoader::dl_resolve_using array for the current architecture. That will be extended by $BSLOADLIBS, which was computed by ExtUtils::Liblist::ext(). If this array still is empty, we do nothing, else we write a .bs file with an @DynaLoader::dl_resolve_using array.
trans-unit.target: 该文件将被解析，并为当前体系结构生成一个可能为空的 @DynaLoader::dl_resolve_using 数组。这将由$ BSLOADLIBS扩展，该扩展由ExtUtils :: Liblist :: ext（）计算。如果该数组仍然为空，则不执行任何操作，否则我们将使用 @DynaLoader::dl_resolve_using 数组编写一个.bs文件。

trans-unit.source: This filter ensures that all data written to the DBM file is null terminated. This is useful when you have a perl script that needs to interoperate with a DBM file that a C program also uses. A fairly common issue is for the C application to include the terminating null in a string when it writes to the DBM file. This filter will ensure that all data written to the DBM file can be read by the C application.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器确保所有写入DBM文件的数据都是空结束的。当你有一个perl脚本需要与一个C程序也使用的DBM文件进行交互时,这个过滤器就很有用。一个相当常见的问题是,当C程序向DBM文件写入数据时,会在一个字符串中包含终止的null。这个过滤器将确保所有写入DBM文件的数据可以被C程序读取。

trans-unit.source: This filter will compress all data before it is written to the database and uncompressed it on reading.
trans-unit.target: 这个过滤器会在数据写入数据库之前压缩所有数据,并在读取时解压。

trans-unit.target: 最后一个示例同时包含普通代码和模式代码表达式。它检测二进制字符串 1101010010001... 的斐波那契间距是否为 '1' 的0,1,1,2,3,5，... ：

trans-unit.source: This final example contains both ordinary and pattern code expressions. It detects whether a binary string 1101010010001... has a Fibonacci spacing 0,1,1,2,3,5,... of the 1 's:
trans-unit.target: 最后一个示例包含普通代码和模式代码表达式。它检测二进制字符串 1101010010001... 的斐波那契间距是否为 1 的0,1,1,2,3,5，... ：

trans-unit.source: This finishes implementation of a primitive symbolic calculator in 50 lines of Perl code. Since the numeric values of subexpressions are not cached, the calculator is very slow.
trans-unit.target: 这就用50行Perl代码完成了一个原始符号计算器的实现。由于子表达式的数值没有被缓存,所以计算器的速度非常慢。

trans-unit.source: This first trivial example will call a Perl subroutine,
trans-unit.target: 这第一个琐碎的例子将调用一个Perl子程序。

trans-unit.source: This flag has 2 effects:
trans-unit.target: 这个旗子有2个效果。

trans-unit.source: This flag has an important effect on Perl's treatment of the string: if UTF-8 data is not properly distinguished, regular expressions, length, substr and other string handling operations will have undesirable (wrong) results.
trans-unit.target: 此标志对Perl的字符串处理有重要影响：如果未正确区分UTF-8数据，则正则表达式， length ， substr 和其他字符串处理操作将产生不良（错误）结果。

trans-unit.source: This flag has an important effect on Perl's treatment of the string: if UTF-8 data is not properly distinguished, regular expressions, length, substr and other string handling operations will have undesirable (wrong) results.
trans-unit.target: 此标志对Perl的字符串处理有重要影响：如果未正确区分UTF-8数据，则正则表达式， length ， substr 和其他字符串处理操作将产生不良（错误）结果。

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to true if the API is tracing through subroutine calls.
trans-unit.target: 如果API通过子程序调用进行跟踪,则该标志被设置为true。

trans-unit.source: This flag is supported in Sun WorkShop Compilers 5.0 and onwards (now marketed under the name Forte) when used on Solaris 7 or later on UltraSparc systems.
trans-unit.target: 当在Solaris 7或更高版本的UltraSparc系统上使用时,Sun WorkShop Compilers 5.0及以后的版本(现在以Forte的名称销售)支持该标志。

trans-unit.source: This flag tells Perl to interpret the supplied string as a vector of integers, one for each character in the string. Perl applies the format to each integer in turn, then joins the resulting strings with a separator (a dot . by default). This can be useful for displaying ordinal values of characters in arbitrary strings:
trans-unit.target: 此标志告诉Perl将提供的字符串解释为整数向量，该整数表示字符串中的每个字符。Perl依次将格式应用于每个整数，然后使用分隔符（默认为点 . ）连接结果字符串。这对于显示任意字符串中字符的有序值很有用：

trans-unit.source: This flag was removed in perl 5.18.0. split ' ' is now special-cased solely in the parser. RXf_SPLIT is still #defined, so you can test for it. This is how it used to work:
trans-unit.target: 此标志已在perl 5.18.0中删除。现在，仅在解析器中对 split ' ' 进行了特殊区分。RXf_SPLIT仍然是#defined，因此您可以对其进行测试。这是它过去的工作方式：

trans-unit.source: This flag was removed in perl 5.18.0. split ' ' is now special-cased solely in the parser. RXf_SPLIT is still #defined, so you can test for it. This is how it used to work:
trans-unit.target: 此标志已在perl 5.18.0中删除。现在，仅在解析器中对 split ' ' 进行了特殊区分。RXf_SPLIT仍然是#defined，因此您可以对其进行测试。这是它过去的工作方式：

trans-unit.source: This flag was removed in perl 5.18.0. It is still #defined, so you can set it, but doing so will have no effect. This is how it used to work:
trans-unit.target: 这个标志在perl 5.18.0中被移除。它仍然是#defined的,所以你可以设置它,但这样做不会有任何效果。这就是以前的工作方式。

trans-unit.source: This flag, if given, suppresses the URL when anchor text is given, so this example would be formatted as just foo . This can produce less cluttered output in cases where the URLs are not particularly important.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供此标志，则在提供锚文本时将禁止显示URL，因此此示例的格式将仅为 foo 。在URL不是特别重要的情况下，这可以减少混乱的输出。

trans-unit.source: This flag, if given, suppresses the URL when anchor text is given, so this example would be formatted as just foo. This can produce less cluttered output in cases where the URLs are not particularly important.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供此标志，则在给出锚文本时将禁止显示URL，因此此示例的格式将仅为 foo 。在URL不是特别重要的情况下，这可以减少混乱的输出。

trans-unit.source: This flag, used in the length slot of hash entries and magic structures, specifies the structure contains an SV* pointer where a char* pointer is to be expected. (For information only--not to be used).
trans-unit.target: 该标志用在哈希条目和魔术结构的长度槽中，用于指定包含 SV* 指针的结构，在该指针中应有 char* 指针。（仅供参考，请勿使用）。

trans-unit.source: This fools Perl into not matching the ligatures.
trans-unit.target: 这样就可以愚弄Perl,使其不匹配连接符。

trans-unit.source: This forces the AUTOLOAD for SO_LINGER to take place before SO_LINGER is encountered later in My package.
trans-unit.target: 这迫使 AUTOLOAD 为 SO_LINGER SO_LINGER在以后遇到之前进行 My 包。

trans-unit.source: This forces the short and the long members to be little-endian, and is just fine if you don't have too many struct members. But we could also use the byte-order modifier on a group and write the following:
trans-unit.target: 这样就强制短成员和长成员都是小字节的,如果你的结构成员不多的话,就可以了。但我们也可以在一个组上使用字节序修饰符,并写出以下内容。

trans-unit.source: This form guarantees to evaluate sv only once. Only use this if sv is an expression with side effects, otherwise use the more efficient SvIV.
trans-unit.target: 这种形式保证只评估一次 sv 。仅当 sv 是具有副作用的表达式时才使用此选项，否则请使用更有效的 SvIV 。

trans-unit.source: This form guarantees to evaluate sv only once. Only use this if sv is an expression with side effects, otherwise use the more efficient SvNV.
trans-unit.target: 这种形式保证只评估一次 sv 。仅当 sv 是具有副作用的表达式时才使用此选项，否则请使用更有效的 SvNV 。

trans-unit.source: This form guarantees to evaluate sv only once. Only use this if sv is an expression with side effects, otherwise use the more efficient SvTRUE.
trans-unit.target: 这种形式保证只评估一次 sv 。仅当 sv 是具有副作用的表达式时才使用此选项，否则请使用效率更高的 SvTRUE 。

trans-unit.source: This form guarantees to evaluate sv only once. Only use this if sv is an expression with side effects, otherwise use the more efficient SvUV.
trans-unit.target: 这种形式保证只评估一次 sv 。仅当 sv 是具有副作用的表达式时才使用此选项，否则请使用更有效的 SvUV 。

trans-unit.source: This form of the pragma allows essentially seamless handling of locales with Unicode. The collation order will be by Unicode code point order. Unicode::Collate can be used to get Unicode rules collation.
trans-unit.target: 这种形式的编译指示实质上允许使用Unicode无缝地处理语言环境。整理顺序将按Unicode代码点顺序进行。Unicode :: Collat​​e可用于获取Unicode规则排序规则。

trans-unit.source: This form of the pragma allows essentially seamless handling of locales with Unicode. The collation order will be by Unicode code point order. It is strongly recommended that when you need to order and sort strings that you use the standard module Unicode::Collate which gives much better results in many instances than you can get with the old-style locale handling.
trans-unit.target: 这种编译指示形式允许使用Unicode无缝地处理语言环境。整理顺序将按Unicode代码点顺序进行。强烈建议您在需要对字符串进行排序和排序时，使用标准模块Unicode :: Collat​​e，它在许多实例中提供的效果比旧式语言环境处理要好得多。

trans-unit.source: This formality is needed when properties are not binary; that is, if they can take on more values than just True and False . For example, the Bidi_Class property (see Bidirectional Character Types below), can take on several different values, such as Left , Right , Whitespace , and others. To match these, one needs to specify both the property name (Bidi_Class ), AND the value being matched against (Left , Right ,
trans-unit.target: 如果属性不是二进制的，则需要这种形式。也就是说，如果它们可以接受的值不仅仅是 True 和 False 。例如， Bidi_Class 属性（请参见下面的双向字符类型）可以采用几个不同的值，例如 Left ， Right ， Whitespace 和其他。要匹配这些属性，需要同时指定属性名称（ Bidi_Class ）和要与之匹配的值（ Left ， Right ，

trans-unit.source: This formality is needed when properties are not binary; that is, if they can take on more values than just True and False. For example, the Bidi_Class property (see "Bidirectional Character Types" below), can take on several different values, such as Left, Right, Whitespace, and others. To match these, one needs to specify both the property name (Bidi_Class), AND the value being matched against (Left, Right,
trans-unit.target: 如果属性不是二进制的，则需要这种形式。也就是说，如果它们可以接受的值不仅仅是 True 和 False 。例如， Bidi_Class 属性（请参见下面的“双向字符类型”）可以采用几个不同的值，例如 Left ， Right ， Whitespace 和其他。为了匹配这些，需要同时指定属性名称（ Bidi_Class ）和要与之匹配的值（ Left ， Right ，

trans-unit.source: This formatting code is syntactically simple, but semantically complex. What it means is that each space in the printable content of this code signifies a non-breaking space.
trans-unit.target: 这个格式代码在语法上很简单,但在语义上很复杂。它的意思是,在该代码的可打印内容中,每一个空格都表示一个非断开的空格。

trans-unit.source: This free toolkit contains the same compiler and linker that ship with Visual C++ .NET 2003 Professional, but doesn't contain everything necessary to build Perl.
trans-unit.target: 这个免费的工具包包含了和Visual C++.NET 2003 Professional一样的编译器和链接器,但并不包含构建Perl所需的一切。

trans-unit.source: This free version of Visual C++ 2005 Professional contains the same compiler and linker that ship with the full version, but doesn't contain everything necessary to build Perl.
trans-unit.target: 这个免费版的Visual C++2005 Professional包含与完整版相同的编译器和链接器,但并不包含构建Perl所需的一切。

trans-unit.source: This function (not exported) lets you reset the sequence numbers (note that they're numbered arbitrarily, their goal being to be human readable). Its purpose is mostly to support testing, i.e. to compare the concise output from two identical anonymous subroutines (but different instances). Without the reset, B::Concise, seeing that they're separate optrees, generates different sequence numbers in the output.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数(没有导出)可以让你重置序列号(注意,它们的编号是任意的,其目的是为了让人可以读懂)。它的目的主要是为了支持测试,即比较两个相同的匿名子程序(但实例不同)的简洁输出。如果没有复位,B::Concise看到它们是独立的optrees,就会在输出中产生不同的序列号。

trans-unit.source: This function accepts any UV as input. To forbid or warn on non-Unicode code points, or those that may be problematic, see uvchr_to_utf8_flags.
trans-unit.target: 此功能接受任何紫外线作为输入。要禁止或警告非Unicode代码点或可能存在问题的代码点，请参见uvchr_to_utf8_flags。

trans-unit.source: This function accepts any code point from 0..IV_MAX as input. IV_MAX is typically 0x7FFF_FFFF in a 32-bit word.
trans-unit.target: 此函数接受0 IV_MAX 任何代码点。IV_MAX作为输入。在32位字中， IV_MAX 通常为0x7FFF_FFFF。

trans-unit.source: This function accepts two arguments, adds them, and prints their sum. Its return value is the numuber of characters it printed, but you probably didn't care about that. But Memoize doesn't understand that. If you memoize this function, you will get the result you expect the first time you ask it to print the sum of 2 and 3, but subsequent calls will return 1 (the return value of print) without actually printing anything.
trans-unit.target: 此函数接受两个参数，将它们相加并打印它们的总和。它的返回值是它打印的字符数，但您可能并不在意。但是 Memoize 对此并不了解。如果记住该功能，则在第一次要求它打印2和3的总和时会得到期望的结果，但是随后的调用将返回1（ print 的返回值），而实际上不打印任何内容。

trans-unit.source: This function accepts two arguments, adds them, and prints their sum. Its return value is the numuber of characters it printed, but you probably didn't care about that. But Memoize doesn't understand that. If you memoize this function, you will get the result you expect the first time you ask it to print the sum of 2 and 3, but subsequent calls will return 1 (the return value of print) without actually printing anything.
trans-unit.target: 此函数接受两个参数，将它们相加并打印它们的总和。它的返回值是它打印的字符数，但是您可能并不在意。但是， Memoize 无法理解这一点。如果记住该功能，则在第一次要求它打印2和3的总和时会得到期望的结果，但是随后的调用将返回1（ print 的返回值），而实际上不打印任何内容。

trans-unit.source: This function adheres to the POSIX syntax for command line options, with GNU extensions. In general, this means that options have long names instead of single letters, and are introduced with a double dash "--". Support for bundling of command line options, as was the case with the more traditional single-letter approach, is provided but not enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数遵循POSIX命令行选项的语法,并有GNU的扩展。一般来说,这意味着选项的名称是长的,而不是单字母,并且用双破折号"--"引入。提供了对命令行选项捆绑的支持,就像传统的单字母方法一样,但默认情况下没有启用。

trans-unit.source: This function allows one to violate the abstraction of variables and get or set the refcount of a variable, and in generally is really only useful in code that is testing refcount behavior.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数允许人们违反变量的抽象,获取或设置变量的refcount,在一般情况下其实只在测试refcount行为的代码中有用。

trans-unit.source: This function applies some optimisations to the optree in top-down order. It is called before the peephole optimizer, which processes ops in execution order. Note that finalize_optree() also does a top-down scan, but is called *after* the peephole optimizer.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数按照自上而下的顺序对optree进行一些优化。它在peephole优化器之前被调用,而peephole优化器是按照执行顺序处理optree的。请注意,finalize_optree()也会进行自上而下的扫描,但它是在*窥视孔优化器之后调用的。

trans-unit.source: This function assigns the prototype of the named core function to sv , or to a new mortal SV if sv is NULL. It returns the modified sv , or NULL if the core function has no prototype. code is a code as returned by keyword() . It must not be equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将命名核心函数的原型分配给 sv ，如果 sv 为NULL 则分配给新的凡人SV 。它返回修改后的 sv ，如果核心函数没有原型，则返回NULL。 code 是由 keyword() 返回的代码。它不能等于0。

trans-unit.source: This function assigns the prototype of the named core function to sv, or to a new mortal SV if sv is NULL. It returns the modified sv, or NULL if the core function has no prototype. code is a code as returned by keyword(). It must not be equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将命名核心函数的原型分配给 sv ，如果 sv 为 NULL ，则分配给新的凡人SV 。它返回修改后的 sv ，如果核心函数没有原型，则返回 NULL 。 code 是由 keyword() 返回的代码。它不能等于0。

trans-unit.source: This function bears the same relationship to the CORE function sysopen as vmsopen does to open. Its first three arguments are the name, access flags, and permissions for the file. Like vmsopen, it takes up to 8 additional string arguments which specify file characteristics. Its return value is identical to that of vmsopen.
trans-unit.target: 此功能担负着核心功能相同的关系 sysopen 为 vmsopen 确实给 open 。它的前三个参数是文件的名称，访问标志和权限。与 vmsopen 一样，它最多需要8个附加的字符串参数来指定文件特征。它的返回值与 vmsopen 的返回值相同。

trans-unit.source: This function behaves the same way that scalar(%hash) behaved prior to Perl 5.25. Specifically if the hash is tied, then it calls the SCALAR tied hash method, if untied then if the hash is empty it return 0, otherwise it returns a string containing the number of used buckets in the hash, followed by a slash, followed by the total number of buckets in the hash.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数的行为方式与 Perl 5.25 之前的 scalar(%hash)的行为方式相同。具体来说,如果哈希值是绑定的,那么它就会调用SCALAR绑定哈希值方法,如果是未绑定的,那么如果哈希值是空的,它就会返回0,否则它就会返回一个字符串,其中包含哈希值中使用过的桶的数量,后面是一个斜线,然后是哈希值中桶的总数。

trans-unit.source: This function behaves the same way under various pragma, such as in a locale, as lc does.
trans-unit.target: 此功能在各种编译指示下（例如在语言环境中）的行为与lc相同。

trans-unit.source: This function behaves the same way under various pragma, such as in a locale, as lc does.
trans-unit.target: 此功能在各种编译指示下（例如在语言环境中）的行为与lc相同。

trans-unit.source: This function behaves the same way under various pragma, such as within "use feature 'unicode_strings" , as lc does, with the single exception of fc of LATIN CAPITAL LETTER SHARP S (U+1E9E) within the scope of use locale . The foldcase of this character would normally be "ss" , but as explained in the lc section, case changes that cross the 255/256 boundary are problematic under locales, and are hence prohibited. Therefore, this function under locale returns instead the string "\x{17F}\x{17F}" , which is the LATIN SMALL LETTER LONG S. Since that character itself folds to "s" , the string of two of them together should be equivalent to a single U+1E9E when foldcased.
trans-unit.target: 此函数的行为下的各种编译指示，诸如内以相同的方式 "use feature 'unicode_strings" ，如LC确实，与唯一例外 fc LATIN CAPITAL LETTER SHARP S（U + 1E9E）的范围内 use locale 。该字符的折号通常为 "ss" ，但是如lc部分所述，跨越255/256边界的大小写更改在区域设置中是有问题的，因此被禁止。因此，该语言环境下的函数将返回字符串 "\x{17F}\x{17F}" ，这是拉丁文的小写字母LONGS。由于该字符本身会折叠为 "s" ，将它们中的两个一起折叠时的字符串应等效于单个U + 1E9E。

Therefore, this function under locale returns instead the string "\x{17F}\x{17F}" , which is the LATIN SMALL LETTER LONG S. Since that character itself folds to "s" , the string of two of them together should be equivalent to a single U+1E9E when foldcased.

trans-unit.target: 该功能在各种编译指示下（例如在语言环境中）的行为与 lc 相同。

trans-unit.target: 该功能在各种语用下（例如在语言环境中）的行为与lc相同。

trans-unit.source: This function behaves the same way under various pragmata, such as in a locale, as lc does.
trans-unit.target: 该功能在各种语用下（例如在语言环境中）的行为与lc相同。

trans-unit.source: This function binds a variable to a package class that will provide the implementation for the variable. VARIABLE is the name of the variable to be enchanted. CLASSNAME is the name of a class implementing objects of correct type. Any additional arguments are passed to the appropriate constructor method of the class (meaning TIESCALAR , TIEHANDLE , TIEARRAY , or TIEHASH ). Typically these are arguments such as might be passed to the dbm_open() function of C. The object returned by the constructor is also returned by the tie function, which would be useful if you want to access other methods in CLASSNAME.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将变量绑定到包类，该包类将提供该变量的实现。 VARIABLE是要附魔的变量的名称。 CLASSNAME是实现正确类型的对象的类的名称。任何其他参数都将传递给该类的相应构造函数方法（意味着 TIESCALAR ， TIEHANDLE ， TIEARRAY 或 TIEHASH ）。通常，这些参数是诸如可能传递给C的 dbm_open() 函数的参数。构造函数返回的对象也由 tie 函数返回，如果要访问CLASSNAME中的其他方法，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: This function binds a variable to a package class that will provide the implementation for the variable. VARIABLE is the name of the variable to be enchanted. CLASSNAME is the name of a class implementing objects of correct type. Any additional arguments are passed to the appropriate constructor method of the class (meaning TIESCALAR , TIEHANDLE , TIEARRAY , or TIEHASH ). Typically these are arguments such as might be passed to the dbm_open() function of C. The object returned by the constructor is also returned by the tie function, which would be useful if you want to access other methods in CLASSNAME.

CLASSNAME is the name of a class implementing objects of correct type. Any additional arguments are passed to the appropriate constructor method of the class (meaning TIESCALAR, TIEHANDLE, TIEARRAY, or TIEHASH). Typically these are arguments such as might be passed to the dbm_open(3) function of C. The object returned by the constructor is also returned by the tie function, which would be useful if you want to access other methods in CLASSNAME.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将变量绑定到包类，该包类将提供该变量的实现。 VARIABLE是要附魔的变量的名称。 CLASSNAME是实现正确类型的对象的类的名称。任何其他参数都将传递到该类的相应构造函数方法（意味着 TIESCALAR ， TIEHANDLE ， TIEARRAY 或 TIEHASH ）。通常，这些参数是诸如可能传递给C的dbm_open（3）函数的参数。构造函数返回的对象也由 tie 函数返回，如果要访问CLASSNAME中的其他方法，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: This function call is functionally identical to:
trans-unit.target: 这个函数的调用在功能上与。

trans-unit.source: This function can cause reliability issues if you are likely to pass in empty strings that are not null terminated, because it will run strlen on the string and potentially run past valid memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果你很可能传入非空结束的空字符串,这个函数可能会导致可靠性问题,因为它会在字符串上运行strlen,并有可能跑过有效内存。

trans-unit.source: This function can take a hash of options:
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以接受一个选项的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: This function cannot be used on an entire array or hash to find out how many elements these have. For that, use scalar @array and scalar keys %hash , respectively.
trans-unit.target: 不能在整个数组或哈希上使用此函数来找出这些元素有多少个元素。为此，分别使用 scalar @array 和 scalar keys %hash 。

trans-unit.source: This function cannot be used on an entire array or hash to find out how many elements these have. For that, use scalar @array and scalar keys %hash , respectively.
trans-unit.target: 不能在整个数组或哈希上使用此函数来找出这些元素有多少个元素。为此，分别使用 scalar @array 和 scalar keys %hash 。

trans-unit.source: This function cannot be used on an entire array or hash to find out how many elements these have. For that, use scalar @array and scalar keys %hash, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 不能在整个数组或哈希上使用此函数来找出这些元素有多少个元素。为此，分别使用 scalar @array 和 scalar keys %hash 。

trans-unit.source: This function causes Perl to wait for the completion of an I/O operation on the file handle specified as its argument. It is used with handles opened for asynchronous I/O, and performs its task by calling the CRTL routine fwait().
trans-unit.target: 这个函数使Perl等待作为参数的文件句柄的I/O操作完成。它用于异步I/O打开的句柄,并通过调用CRTL例程fwait()来执行其任务。

trans-unit.source: This function causes an immediate core dump. See also the -u command-line switch in perlrun, which does the same thing. Primarily this is so that you can use the undump program (not supplied) to turn your core dump into an executable binary after having initialized all your variables at the beginning of the program. When the new binary is executed it will begin by executing a goto LABEL (with all the restrictions that goto suffers). Think of it as a goto with an intervening core dump and reincarnation. If LABEL is omitted, restarts the program from the top. The dump EXPR form, available starting in Perl 5.18.0, allows a name to be computed at run time, being otherwise identical to dump LABEL .
trans-unit.target: 此功能导致立即发生核心转储。另请参见perlrun中的-u命令行开关，其功能相同。首先，这样做是为了使您可以在程序开始处初始化所有变量之后，使用undump程序（未提供）将核心转储转换为可执行二进制文件。当执行新的二进制文件，将通过执行开始 goto LABEL LABEL（与所有限制条件 goto 遭受）。可以将其视为具有中间转储和转世的goto。如果省略了 LABEL ，则从顶部重新启动程序。该 dump EXPR EXPR从Perl 5.18.0开始可用的表单允许在运行时计算名称，否则与 dump LABEL 相同。

trans-unit.source: This function causes an immediate core dump. See also the -u command-line switch in perlrun, which does the same thing. Primarily this is so that you can use the undump program (not supplied) to turn your core dump into an executable binary after having initialized all your variables at the beginning of the program. When the new binary is executed it will begin by executing a goto LABEL (with all the restrictions that goto suffers). Think of it as a goto with an intervening core dump and reincarnation. If LABEL is omitted, restarts the program from the top. The dump EXPR form, available starting in Perl 5.18.0, allows a name to be computed at run time, being otherwise identical to dump LABEL.

trans-unit.source: This function causes the contents of stdio buffers for the specified file handle to be flushed. If undef is used as the argument to flush, all currently open file handles are flushed. Like the CRTL fflush() routine, it does not flush any underlying RMS buffers for the file, so the data may not be flushed all the way to the disk. flush returns a true value if successful, and undef if not.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将刷新指定文件句柄的stdio缓冲区的内容。如果将 undef 用作 flush 的参数，则将刷新所有当前打开的文件句柄。像CRTL fflush（）例程一样，它不会刷新文件的任何基础RMS缓冲区，因此数据可能不会一直刷新到磁盘。如果成功，则 flush 返回true值，否则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: This function causes the file handle to be reopened with the CRTL's carriage control processing disabled; its effect is the same as that of the b access mode in vmsopen. After the file is reopened, the file pointer is positioned as close to its position before the call as possible (
trans-unit.target: 此功能使文件句柄在CRTL的回车控制处理被禁用的情况下被重新打开。其效果与 vmsopen 中的 b 访问模式相同。重新打开文件后，文件指针的位置应尽可能靠近调用之前的位置（

trans-unit.source: This function combines perl_inc() , ccflags() and ccdlflags() into one.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将 perl_inc() ， ccflags() 和 ccdlflags() 合并为一个。

trans-unit.source: This function combines perl_inc(), ccflags() and ccdlflags() into one.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将 perl_inc() ， ccflags() 和 ccdlflags() 合并为一个。

trans-unit.source: This function considers Perl's extended UTF-8 to be valid. That means that code points above Unicode, surrogates, and non-character code points are considered valid by this function. Use "is_strict_utf8_string", "is_c9strict_utf8_string", or "is_utf8_string_flags" to restrict what code points are considered valid.
trans-unit.target: 该函数认为Perl的扩展UTF-8有效。这意味着此函数认为Unicode，代理和非字符代码点以上的代码点有效。使用 "is_strict_utf8_string" ， "is_c9strict_utf8_string" 或 "is_utf8_string_flags" 来限制哪些代码点被视为有效。

trans-unit.source: This function deletes the file named in its argument, returning a true value if successful and undef if not. It differs from the CORE Perl function unlink in that it does not try to reset file protection if the original protection does not give you delete access to the file (cf. perlvms). In other words, remove is equivalent to
trans-unit.target: 此函数删除其参数中命名的文件，如果成功则返回true值，否则返回 undef 。它与CORE Perl函数 unlink 不同之处在于，如果原始保护未给您删除对文件的访问权限，则它不会尝试重置文件保护（请参阅perlvms）。换句话说， remove 等同于

trans-unit.source: This function detects things that can't be modified, such as $x+1 , and generates errors for them. For example, $x+1 = 2 would cause it to be called with an op of type OP_ADD and a type argument of OP_SASSIGN.
trans-unit.target: 此函数检测无法修改的内容，例如 $x+1 ，并为其生成错误。例如， $x+1 = 2 会导致它与类型OP_ADD的运算和一个被称为 type OP_SASSIGN的论点。

trans-unit.source: This function detects things that can't be modified, such as $x+1, and generates errors for them. For example, $x+1 = 2 would cause it to be called with an op of type OP_ADD and a type argument of OP_SASSIGN.
trans-unit.target: 此函数检测无法修改的内容，例如 $x+1 ，并为其生成错误。例如， $x+1 = 2 会导致它与类型的运算被称为 OP_ADD 和 type 的参数 OP_SASSIGN 。

trans-unit.source: This function differs from "is_utf8_string_flags" only in that the latter returns FALSE if the final few bytes of the string don't form a complete code point.
trans-unit.target: 此函数与 "is_utf8_string_flags" 不同之处仅在于，如果字符串的最后几个字节未形成完整的代码点，后者将返回FALSE。

trans-unit.source: This function does not use a typemap. Instead, we declare it as accepting one SV* (scalar) parameter, and returning an SV* value, and we take care of populating these scalars within the code. Because we are only returning one value, we don't need a PPCODE: directive - instead, we use CODE: and OUTPUT: directives.
trans-unit.target: 此函数不使用类型映射。相反，我们将其声明为接受一个SV *（标量）参数，并返回一个SV *值，并负责在代码中填充这些标量。因为只返回一个值，所以不需要 PPCODE: 指令-相反，我们使用 CODE: 和 OUTPUT: 指令。

trans-unit.source: This function enables/disables error popups associated with hardware errors (Disk not ready etc.) and software exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可启用/禁用与硬件错误(磁盘未准备好等)和软件异常相关的错误弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: This function executes code in INIT blocks, and then executes the main program. The code to be executed is that established by the prior call to "perl_parse". If the interpreter's PL_exit_flags word does not have the PERL_EXIT_DESTRUCT_END flag set, then this function will also execute code in END blocks. If it is desired to make any further use of the interpreter after calling this function, then END blocks should be postponed to "perl_destruct" time by setting that flag.
trans-unit.target: 该函数在 INIT 块中执行代码，然后执行主程序。要执行的代码是通过先前对“ perl_parse”的调用而建立的。如果解释器的 PL_exit_flags 字未设置 PERL_EXIT_DESTRUCT_END 标志，则此函数还将在 END 块中执行代码。如果希望在调用此函数后进一步使用解释器，则应通过设置该标志将 END 块推迟到“ perl_destruct”时间。

trans-unit.source: This function finalizes the optree. Should be called directly after the complete optree is built. It does some additional checking which can't be done in the normal ck_xxx functions and makes the tree thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 该函数最终确定optree。完整的optree构建完成后应直接调用。它执行一些常规 ck_ xxx函数无法完成的附加检查，并使树线程安全。

trans-unit.source: This function finalizes the optree. Should be called directly after the complete optree is built. It does some additional checking which can't be done in the normal ck_xxx functions and makes the tree thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以最终完成optree的构建。应该在建立完整的 optree 后直接调用。它做了一些普通ck_xxx函数无法完成的额外检查,并使树的线程安全。

trans-unit.source: This function flushes buffered data for the specified file handle from stdio and RMS buffers all the way to disk. If successful, it returns a true value; otherwise, it returns undef.
trans-unit.target: 此函数从stdio和RMS缓冲区一直到磁盘清除指定文件句柄的缓冲数据。如果成功，它将返回一个真值；否则，它将返回一个真值。否则，它返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: This function has a Perl_ prefix; i.e. it is defined as Perl_av_fetch .
trans-unit.target: 这个函数有一个 Perl_ 前缀。即定义为 Perl_av_fetch 。

trans-unit.source: This function has been removed as of Perl 5.28; instead convert to call the appropriate one of: toFOLD_utf8_safe. toLOWER_utf8_safe, toTITLE_utf8_safe, or toUPPER_utf8_safe.
trans-unit.target: 从Perl 5.28开始，该功能已被删除；而是转换为调用以下适当的一种： toFOLD_utf8_safe 。 toLOWER_utf8_safe ， toTITLE_utf8_safe 或 toUPPER_utf8_safe 。

trans-unit.source: This function has been removed as of v5.24. It was very similar to matching against qr/ ^ [[:alnum:]]+ $ /x, which you should convert to use instead. See "POSIX Character Classes" in perlrecharclass.
