trans-unit.source: This function has been removed as of v5.26. This is identical to the C function, except that it can apply to a single character or to a whole string, and currently operates as if the locale always is "C". Consider using the lc() function, see "lc" in perlfunc, see "lc" in perlfunc, or the equivalent \L operator inside doublequotish strings.
trans-unit.target: 自v5.26起已删除此功能。除了可以应用于单个字符或整个字符串之外，此功能与C函数相同，并且当前的运行方式就像语言环境始终为“ C”一样。考虑使用 lc() 函数，请参阅perlfunc中的“ lc”，请参阅perlfunc中的“ lc”或双引号字符串中的等效 \L 运算符。

trans-unit.source: This function has been removed as of v5.26. This is similar to the C function, except that it can apply to a single character or to a whole string, and currently operates as if the locale always is "C". Consider using the uc() function, see "uc" in perlfunc, or the equivalent \U operator inside doublequotish strings.
trans-unit.target: 自v5.26起已删除此功能。这类似于C函数，除了它可以应用于单个字符或整个字符串之外，并且当前的运行方式就像语言环境始终为“ C”一样。考虑使用 uc() 函数，请参阅perlfunc中的“ uc”或双引号字符串中的等效 \U 运算符。

trans-unit.source: This function has documentation using the apidoc feature which we'll look at in a second. Some functions have 'd' but not 'A'; docs are good.
trans-unit.target: 此函数具有使用 apidoc 功能的文档，我们将在稍后介绍。有些功能带有“ d”但没有“ A”；文档是好的。

trans-unit.source: This function has no direct relation to the usage of sysread, syswrite, or sysseek. A handle opened with this function can be used with buffered IO just as one opened with open can be used with unbuffered IO.
trans-unit.target: 此功能与 sysread ， syswrite 或 sysseek 的使用没有直接关系。使用此功能打开的句柄可以与缓冲IO一起使用，就像使用 open 打开的句柄可以与无缓冲IO一起使用一样。

trans-unit.source: This function initialises the interpreter, and parses and compiles the script specified by the command-line arguments. This includes executing code in BEGIN, UNITCHECK, and CHECK blocks. It does not execute INIT blocks or the main program.
trans-unit.target: 该函数初始化解释器，并解析和编译由命令行参数指定的脚本。这包括在 BEGIN ， UNITCHECK 和 CHECK 块中执行代码。它不执行 INIT 块或主程序。

trans-unit.source: This function invalidates isa caches on the old stash, on all subpackages nested inside it, and on the subclasses of all those, including non-existent packages that have corresponding entries in stash .
trans-unit.target: 此功能会使旧存储库，嵌套在其中的所有子包以及所有这些存储库的子类上的isa缓存失效，包括那些在 stash 中具有相应条目的不存在的程序包。

trans-unit.source: This function invalidates isa caches on the old stash, on all subpackages nested inside it, and on the subclasses of all those, including non-existent packages that have corresponding entries in stash.
trans-unit.target: 此函数会使旧存储库，嵌套在其中的所有子包以及所有这些存储库的子类（包括不存在的，在 stash 中具有相应条目的包）的子类上的isa缓存失效。

trans-unit.source: This function is a deprecated synonym for "uvoffuni_to_utf8_flags", which itself, while not deprecated, should be used only in isolated circumstances. These functions were useful for code that wanted to handle both EBCDIC and ASCII platforms with Unicode properties, but starting in Perl v5.20, the distinctions between the platforms have mostly been made invisible to most code, so this function is quite unlikely to be what you want.
trans-unit.target: 该函数是“ uvoffuni_to_utf8_flags”的不赞成使用的同义词，该函数本身（尽管不被赞成）仅应在单独的情况下使用。这些功能对于想要使用Unicode属性处理EBCDIC和ASCII平台的代码很有用，但是从Perl v5.20开始，大多数代码几乎看不到平台之间的区别，因此该功能不太可能是你要。

trans-unit.source: This function is a deprecated synonym for uvoffuni_to_utf8_flags, which itself, while not deprecated, should be used only in isolated circumstances. These functions were useful for code that wanted to handle both EBCDIC and ASCII platforms with Unicode properties, but starting in Perl v5.20, the distinctions between the platforms have mostly been made invisible to most code, so this function is quite unlikely to be what you want.
trans-unit.target: 该函数是uvoffuni_to_utf8_flags的不推荐使用的同义词，该功能本身（虽然不推荐使用）仅应在单独的情况下使用。这些功能对于希望同时处理具有Unicode属性的EBCDIC和ASCII平台的代码很有用，但是从Perl v5.20开始，大多数代码几乎看不到平台之间的区别，因此该功能不太可能是你要。

trans-unit.source: This function is a good candidate for memoization. If you memoize the `fib' function above, it will compute fib(14) exactly once, the first time it needs to, and then save the result in a table. Then if you ask for fib(14) again, it gives you the result out of the table. While computing fib(14), instead of computing fib(12) twice, it does it once; the second time it needs the value it gets it from the table. It doesn't compute fib(11) four times; it computes it once, getting it from the table the next three times. Instead of making 1,200 recursive calls to `fib', it makes 15. This makes the function about 150 times faster.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数是一个很好的记忆化的候选函数。如果你把上面的`fib'函数备忘录化,它将在第一次需要计算fib(14)的时候准确地计算一次,然后把结果保存在一个表中。然后,如果你再问fib(14),它就会把结果从表中给你。在计算fib(14)时,它不是计算两次fib(12),而是计算一次;第二次需要值时,它从表中获取。它不计算 fib(11)四次,而是计算一次,接下来三次从表中获取。它不需要对`fib'进行 1200 次递归调用,而是进行 15 次。这使得函数的速度快了150倍。

trans-unit.source: This function is a part of the public API. All such functions should also have 'd', very few do not.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数是公共API的一部分。所有这样的函数也应该有'd',很少有不这样做的。

trans-unit.source: This function is a stand-in replacement for Scalar::Util::refaddr, that is, it returns the reference address of its argument as a numeric value. The only difference is that refaddr() returns undef when given a non-reference while id() returns its argument unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 此函数是Scalar :: Util :: refaddr的替代品，即，它以数字值形式返回其参数的引用地址。唯一的区别是，当给定非引用时， refaddr() 返回 undef ，而 id() 返回其参数不变。

trans-unit.source: This function is a stand-in replacement for Scalar::Util::refaddr, that is, it returns the reference address of its argument as a numeric value. The only difference is that refaddr() returns undef when given a non-reference while id() returns its argument unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 该函数替代了Scalar :: Util :: refaddr，即，它以数字值形式返回其参数的引用地址。唯一的区别是，当给定非引用时， refaddr() 返回 undef ，而 id() 返回其参数不变。

trans-unit.source: This function is affected by the $RAND variable.
trans-unit.target: 此函数受 $RAND 变量影响。

trans-unit.source: This function is deprecated due to the possibility that malformed input could cause reading beyond the end of the input buffer. Use "isUTF8_CHAR" instead.
trans-unit.target: 由于错误的输入可能导致读取超出输入缓冲区末尾的可能性，因此不建议使用此功能。使用“ isUTF8_CHAR”代替。

trans-unit.source: This function is deprecated due to the possibility that malformed input could cause reading beyond the end of the input buffer. Use isUTF8_CHAR instead.
trans-unit.target: 由于错误的输入可能导致读取超出输入缓冲区末尾的可能性，因此不建议使用此功能。请改用isUTF8_CHAR。

trans-unit.source: This function is disabled if the global variable $KEEP_ALL is true and an unlink on open file is supported. If the unlink is to be deferred to the END block, the file is still registered for removal.
trans-unit.target: 如果全局变量$KEEP_ALL为真,并且支持在打开文件时取消链接,则禁用此功能。如果取消链接的时间被推迟到END块,那么文件仍然会被删除。

trans-unit.source: This function is disabled if the global variable $KEEP_ALL is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果全局变量$KEEP_ALL为true,则该函数被禁用。

trans-unit.source: This function is equivalent to the libc strtod() function, and is available even on platforms that lack plain strtod(). Its return value is the best available precision depending on platform capabilities and
trans-unit.target: 这个函数相当于libc的strtod()函数,即使在没有普通strtod()的平台上也可以使用。它的返回值是最佳的可用精度,取决于平台能力和

trans-unit.source: This function is expected to be called in a Perl compilation context, and some aspects of the subroutine are taken from global variables associated with compilation. In particular, PL_compcv represents the subroutine that is currently being compiled. It must be non-null when this function is called, and some aspects of the subroutine being constructed are taken from it. The constructed subroutine may actually be a reuse of the PL_compcv object, but will not necessarily be so.
trans-unit.target: 期望在Perl编译上下文中调用此函数，并且该子例程的某些方面来自与编译关联的全局变量。特别地， PL_compcv 代表当前正在编译的子例程。调用此函数时，它必须为非null，并从中获取正在构造的子例程的某些方面。构造的子例程实际上可以是 PL_compcv 对象的重用，但不一定如此。

trans-unit.source: This function is expected to be used to signal to perl that this SV is about to be written to, and any extra book-keeping needs to be taken care of. Hence, it croaks on read-only values.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数被认为是用来向perl发出信号,表示这个SV即将被写入,并且需要处理任何额外的记账。因此,它在只读值上会发出呱呱声。

trans-unit.source: This function is expensive in time and memory.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能在时间和内存上都很昂贵。

trans-unit.source: This function is expensive, it must scan all of the buckets to determine which are used, and the count is NOT cached. In a large hash this could be a lot of buckets.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数很昂贵,它必须扫描所有的buckets来确定哪些是被使用的,而且计数是不被缓存的。在一个大的哈希中,这可能是很多的桶。

trans-unit.source: This function is explicitly exported.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能是明确输出的。

trans-unit.source: This function is for code that needs to know what the precise malformation(s) are when an error is found, and wants the corresponding warning and/or error messages to be returned to the caller rather than be displayed. All messages that would have been displayed if all lexcial warnings are enabled will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数适用于需要知道当发现错误时准确的畸形情况的代码,并且希望将相应的警告和/或错误信息返回给调用者而不是显示。如果启用了所有的词法警告,所有本应显示的信息都将被返回。

trans-unit.source: This function is for code that needs to know what the precise malformation(s) are when an error is found. If you also need to know the generated warning messages, use "utf8n_to_uvchr_msgs"() instead.
trans-unit.target: 此功能适用于需要在发现错误时知道确切格式错误的代码。如果还需要了解生成的警告消息，请改用“ utf8n_to_uvchr_msgs”（）。

trans-unit.source: This function is for code that wants any warning and/or error messages to be returned to the caller rather than be displayed. All messages that would have been displayed if all lexical warnings are enabled will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 该函数用于希望将任何警告和/或错误信息返回给调用者而不是显示的代码。如果启用所有词法警告,所有本应显示的信息都将被返回。

trans-unit.source: This function is internal to Perl because khw thinks that any XS code that would want this is probably operating too close to the internals. Presenting a valid use case could change that.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数是Perl的内部函数,因为khw认为任何需要这个函数的XS代码都可能是在太接近内部的情况下运行的。提出一个有效的用例可以改变这一点。

trans-unit.source: This function is like eval with a string argument, except it always parses its argument, or $_ if EXPR is omitted, as a string of bytes. A string containing characters whose ordinal value exceeds 255 results in an error. Source filters activated within the evaluated code apply to the code itself.
trans-unit.target: 此函数类似于带有字符串参数的eval，不同之处在于它始终将其参数解析为 $_ 如果省略EXPR则解析为$ _）作为字节字符串。包含序数值超过255的字符的字符串将导致错误。在评估代码中激活的源过滤器将应用于代码本身。

A string containing characters whose ordinal value exceeds 255 results in an error. Source filters activated within the evaluated code apply to the code itself.

trans-unit.source: This function is provided for compatibility with the Unix shell command basename(1) . It does NOT always return the file name portion of a path as you might expect. To be safe, if you want the file name portion of a path use fileparse() .

trans-unit.source: This function is provided for compatibility with the Unix shell command basename(1). It does NOT always return the file name portion of a path as you might expect. To be safe, if you want the file name portion of a path use fileparse().
trans-unit.target: 提供此功能是为了与Unix Shell命令 basename(1) 兼容。它不总是返回路径的文件名部分，你可能期望。为了安全起见，如果您想要路径的文件名部分，请使用 fileparse() 。

trans-unit.source: This function is provided for compatibility with the Unix shell command dirname(1) and has inherited some of its quirks. In spite of its name it does NOT always return the directory name as you might expect. To be safe, if you want the directory name of a path use fileparse() .
trans-unit.target: 提供此函数是为了与Unix shell命令 dirname(1) 兼容，并且继承了它的一些怪癖。尽管它的名字它不总是返回正如你所预料的目录名。为了安全起见，如果您想要路径的目录名称，请使用 fileparse() 。

trans-unit.source: This function is provided for compatibility with the Unix shell command dirname(1) and has inherited some of its quirks. In spite of its name it does NOT always return the directory name as you might expect. To be safe, if you want the directory name of a path use fileparse().
trans-unit.target: 提供此函数是为了与Unix shell命令 dirname(1) 兼容，并且继承了它的一些怪癖。尽管它的名字它不总是返回正如你所预料的目录名。为了安全起见，如果您想要路径的目录名称，请使用 fileparse() 。

trans-unit.source: This function is rarely used since you will usually get the value of a constant by having that constant imported into your package by listing the constant name in the use Win32API::File statement and then simply using the constant name in your code [perhaps followed by ()]. This function is useful for verifying constant names not in Perl code, for example, after prompting a user to type in a constant name.
trans-unit.target: 很少使用此函数，因为通常通过以下方式来获取常量的值：通过在 use Win32API::File 语句中列出常量名称，然后在代码中简单地使用常量名称，将常量导入包中即可。 () ]。例如，在提示用户键入常量名称后，此功能对于验证不在Perl代码中的常量名称很有用。

trans-unit.source: This function is similar to a string eval, except it always parses its argument (or $_ if EXPR is omitted) as a string of independent bytes.
trans-unit.target: 此函数类似于字符串eval，除了它始终将其参数（或 $_ 如果省略EXPR）解析为独立字节的字符串。

trans-unit.target: 这个函数比其他等价的代码略微整洁和方便一些

trans-unit.source: This function is the implementation of the "LINKLIST" macro. It should not be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 该功能是“ LINKLIST”宏的实现。不应直接调用它。

trans-unit.source: This function is the reason for Test 's existence. It's the basic function that handles printing "ok " or "not ok ", along with the current test number. (That's what Test::Harness wants to see.)
trans-unit.target: 此功能是 Test 存在的原因。这是处理打印“ ok ”或“ not ok ”以及当前测试编号的基本功能。（这就是 Test::Harness 想要看到的。）

trans-unit.source: This function is the reason for Test's existence. It's the basic function that handles printing "ok" or "not ok", along with the current test number. (That's what Test::Harness wants to see.)
trans-unit.target: 此功能是 Test 存在的原因。这是处理打印“ ok ”或“ not ok ”以及当前测试编号的基本功能。（这就是 Test::Harness 想要看到的。）

trans-unit.source: This function is used to create an in-memory gzip file with the minimum possible gzip header (exactly 10 bytes).
trans-unit.target: 这个函数用于创建一个内存中的gzip文件,其gzip头最小(正好是10字节)。

trans-unit.source: This function is used to uncompress an in-memory gzip file.
trans-unit.target: 该函数用于解压内存中的gzip文件。

trans-unit.source: This function is useful for producing a directory tree identical to the intended distribution tree.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数对于生成一个与目标分布树相同的目录树非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This function is useful in two cases: a) finding the trailing text after a JSON object or b) parsing multiple JSON objects separated by non-JSON text (such as commas).
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在两种情况下很有用:a)查找JSON对象后面的尾部文本或b)解析多个由非JSON文本(如逗号)分隔的JSON对象。

trans-unit.source: This function is very slow. Why? To compute fib(14), it first wants to compute fib(13) and fib(12), and add the results. But to compute fib(13), it first has to compute fib(12) and fib(11), and then it comes back and computes fib(12) all over again even though the answer is the same. And both of the times that it wants to compute fib(12), it has to compute fib(11) from scratch, and then it has to do it again each time it wants to compute fib(13). This function does so much recomputing of old results that it takes a really long time to run---fib(14) makes 1,200 extra recursive calls to itself, to compute and recompute things that it already computed.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能非常慢。为什么呢?它要计算fib(14),首先要计算fib(13)和fib(12),然后把结果相加。但是要计算fib(13),它先要计算fib(12)和fib(11),然后再回来重新计算fib(12),尽管答案是一样的。而且两次要计算fib(12)的时候,都要从头开始计算fib(11),然后每次要计算fib(13)的时候又要重新计算。这个函数对旧的结果做了太多的重新计算,以至于它需要很长的时间来运行------fib(14)对自己做了1200次额外的递归调用,来计算和重新计算它已经计算过的东西。

trans-unit.source: This function is visible to extensions included in the Perl core.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数对Perl核心中的扩展是可见的。

trans-unit.source: This function is wrapped by the macro HvFILL.
trans-unit.target: 此函数由宏 HvFILL 包装。

trans-unit.source: This function isn't exported out of the Perl core.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数并没有从Perl核心中导出。

trans-unit.source: This function looks at the sequence of bytes between s and e, which are assumed to be encoded in ASCII/Latin1, and returns how many of them would change should the string be translated into UTF-8. Due to the nature of UTF-8, each of these would occupy two bytes instead of the single one in the input string. Thus, this function returns the precise number of bytes the string would expand by when translated to UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 此函数查看 s 和 e 之间的字节序列，假定它们以ASCII / Latin1编码，并返回如果将字符串转换为UTF-8会改变多少字节。由于UTF-8的性质，其中每个字节将占用两个字节，而不是输入字符串中的单个字节。因此，此函数返回当转换为UTF-8时字符串将扩展的确切字节数。

trans-unit.source: This function makes use of the fact that the presence of tainted data anywhere within an expression renders the entire expression tainted. It would be inefficient for every operator to test every argument for taintedness. Instead, the slightly more efficient and conservative approach is used that if any tainted value has been accessed within the same expression, the whole expression is considered tainted.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数利用了这样一个事实,即在一个表达式中的任何地方出现污点数据都会使整个表达式受到污染。如果每个操作者都要测试每个参数的污染性,效率会很低。相反,我们采用了稍微高效和保守的方法,即如果在同一个表达式中访问了任何污点值,则整个表达式被认为是污点。

trans-unit.source: This function may redirect error popups associated with hardware errors (Disk not ready etc.) and software exceptions to the file POPUPLOG.OS2 at the root directory of the specified drive. Overrides OS2::Error() specified by individual programs. Given argument undef will disable redirection.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以将与硬件错误(Disk not ready等)和软件异常相关的错误弹出窗口重定向到指定驱动器根目录下的文件POPUPLOG.OS2。覆盖OS2::Error(),由个别程序指定。给定参数 undef 将禁用重定向。

trans-unit.source: This function may return the pathname in Unicode if it cannot be represented in the system codepage. Use Win32::GetANSIPathName() before passing the path to a system call or another program.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统代码页中不能表示路径名,该函数可能会返回Unicode格式的路径名。在将路径传递给系统调用或其他程序之前,请使用Win32::GetANSIPathName()。

trans-unit.source: This function modifies and queries the program's underlying locale. Users of this function should read perllocale, whch provides a comprehensive discussion of Perl locale handling, knowledge of which is necessary to properly use this function. It contains a section devoted to this function. The discussion here is merely a summary reference for setlocale(). Note that Perl itself is almost entirely unaffected by the locale except within the scope of "use locale". (Exceptions are listed in "Not within the scope of "use locale"" in perllocale, and locale-dependent functions within the POSIX module ARE always affected by the current locale.)
trans-unit.target: 此函数修改并查询程序的基础语言环境。使用此功能的用户应阅读perllocale，其中提供了有关Perl语言环境处理的全面讨论，有关正确使用此功能所必需的知识。它包含一个专门讨论此功能的部分。这里的讨论仅仅是 setlocale() 的简要参考。注意，Perl本身几乎不受语言环境的影响，除非在 "use locale" 的范围内。 （在perllocale中的“不在“使用语言环境”的范围内“中列出了异常，并且POSIX模块内依赖于语言环境的功能始终受当前语言环境的影响。）

trans-unit.source: This function must only be called during parsing of a subroutine; after "start_subparse" has been called. It might allocate lexical variables on the pad for the current subroutine.
trans-unit.target: 该函数只能在子例程的解析过程中调用；在调用“ start_subparse”之后。它可能会在填充板上为当前子例程分配词汇变量。

trans-unit.target: 这个函数将咨询锁放置在一个共享变量或引用对象上,该对象包含在这个函数中。

trans-unit.source: This function reads the environment and generates an appropriate argument hash from it. If given any arguments in %extra_args, these will override the environmental defaults. In accepts harness_class (which defaults to TAP::Harness), and any argument the harness class accepts.
trans-unit.target: 此函数读取环境并从中生成适当的参数哈希。如果在 %extra_args 中提供了任何参数，则这些参数将覆盖环境默认值。在接受 harness_class （默认为 TAP::Harness ），和任何参数线束类接受。

trans-unit.source: This function returns FALSE for strings containing any code points above the Unicode max of 0x10FFFF or surrogate code points, but accepts non-character code points per Corrigendum #9.
trans-unit.target: 对于包含大于Unicode最大0x10FFFF的任何代码点或代理代码点的字符串，此函数返回FALSE，但根据更正＃9接受非字符代码点。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the count of used buckets in the hash. It is expensive to calculate and the value is NOT cached, so avoid use of this function in production code.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回哈希中使用过的桶的数量。它的计算成本很高,而且该值不会被缓存,所以在生产代码中避免使用该函数。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the plain text version of the string given as argument. The lines of the result are "\n" terminated, even if the $str argument contains "\r\n" terminated lines.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回作为参数的字符串的纯文本版本。即使$str参数包含"\r\n "终止的行,结果中的行也是"\n "终止的。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the string that results from decoding the scalar value
trans-unit.target: 该函数返回标量值解码后的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the string with the first character modified if it is a control character. It converts it to ^X format first, so that "\cG" becomes "^G". This is used internally by B::GV::SAFENAME, but you can call it directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是控制字符，则此函数返回修改后的第一个字符的字符串。它将首先将其转换为^ X格式，以便“ \ cG”变为“ ^ G”。由B :: GV :: SAFENAME内部使用，但是您可以直接调用它。

trans-unit.source: This function returns the total number of buckets the hash holds, or would hold if the array were created. (When a hash is freshly created the array may not be allocated even though this value will be non-zero.)
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回哈希持有的桶的总数,或者说如果创建了数组,哈希将持有的桶的总数(当一个数组是新创建的时候,即使这个值是非零,也可能没有分配)。(当一个哈希是新创建的时候,即使这个值不为零,数组也可能不会被分配。)

trans-unit.source: This function sets the default device and directory for the process. It is identical to the built-in chdir() operator, except that the change persists after Perl exits. It returns a true value on success, and undef if it encounters an error.
trans-unit.target: 此功能设置进程的默认设备和目录。它与内置的chdir（）运算符相同，不同之处在于更改在Perl退出后仍然存在。成功时返回真值，遇到错误则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: This function should be as efficient as possible to keep your programs running as fast as possible.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能应该尽可能地提高工作效率,以保证你的程序尽可能快地运行。

trans-unit.source: This function should have been named wantlist() instead.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数应该被命名为wantlist()。

trans-unit.source: This function should not be called if you are using the object oriented interface since the it will interfere with the object destructor deleting the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的是面向对象的接口,这个函数就不应该被调用,因为它将会干扰对象析构器删除文件。

trans-unit.source: This function should not have a compatibility macro to define, say, Perl_parse to parse . It must be called as Perl_parse .
trans-unit.target: 该函数不应具有用于定义要 parse Perl_parse 的兼容性宏。它必须称为 Perl_parse 。

trans-unit.source: This function should only be used to display the actual OS name to the user; it should not be used to determine the class of operating systems this system belongs to. The Win32::GetOSName(), Win32::GetOSVersion, Win32::GetProductInfo() and Win32::GetSystemMetrics() functions provide the base information to check for certain capabilities, or for families of OS releases.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只能用来向用户显示实际的操作系统名称,不能用来确定这个系统属于哪一类操作系统。Win32::GetOSName()、Win32::GetOSVersion、Win32::GetProductInfo()和Win32::GetSystemMetrics()函数提供了检查某些功能或操作系统版本系列的基本信息。

trans-unit.source: This function simply calls the Microsoft C library _getdcwd() function.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只是简单地调用微软C库的_getdcwd()函数。

trans-unit.source: This function simply returns a string defining the same EXTERN_C macro as
trans-unit.target: 该函数仅返回定义与 EXTERN_C 宏相同的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This function skips over the automatic calls to &DB::sub made on the behalf of the debugger. If the stack frame requested was a sub called by DB::sub , the return value will be the frame for the call to DB::sub , since that has the correct line number/etc. for the call site. If
trans-unit.target: 此函数跳过代表调试器对 &DB::sub 的自动调用。如果请求的堆栈帧是由 DB::sub sub调用的子帧，则返回值将是调用 DB::sub 的帧，因为它具有正确的行号/等。用于呼叫站点。如果

trans-unit.source: This function skips over the automatic calls to &DB::sub made on the behalf of the debugger. If the stack frame requested was a sub called by DB::sub, the return value will be the frame for the call to DB::sub, since that has the correct line number/etc. for the call site. If

trans-unit.source: This function takes a codeblock as its only argument, and it has a prototype. It will execute the codeblock, intercepting any generated events in the process. It will return an array reference with all the generated event objects. All events should be subclasses of Test2::Event.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将代码块作为唯一参数，并且具有原型。它将执行代码块，拦截过程中生成的任何事件。它将返回包含所有生成的事件对象的数组引用。所有事件都应该是Test2 :: Event的子类。

trans-unit.source: This function takes a list of 0 or more language tags that constitute a given user's Accept-Language list, and returns a list of tags for
trans-unit.target: 这个函数接收构成用户接受语言列表的0个或更多语言标签的列表,并返回一个标签列表,供用户使用。

trans-unit.source: This function takes a scalar argument and returns a boolean value indicating whether the argument meets the "lax" rules for a version number. Leading and trailing spaces are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数接受一个标量参数,并返回一个布尔值,表示该参数是否符合版本号的 "宽松 "规则。不允许使用前导和尾部的空格。

trans-unit.source: This function takes a scalar argument and returns a boolean value indicating whether the argument meets the "strict" rules for a version number. Leading and trailing spaces are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数接受一个标量参数,并返回一个布尔值,表示该参数是否符合版本号的 "严格 "规则。不允许使用前导和尾部的空格。

trans-unit.source: This function takes a variable number of arguments, printf style. The argument list should end with ... , like this:
trans-unit.target: 此函数采用可变数量的参数，即 printf 样式。参数列表应以 ... 结尾，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: This function takes no arguments, and as far as Memoize is concerned, it always returns the same result. Memoize is wrong, of course, and the memoized version of this function will call time once to get the current time, and it will return that same time every time you call it after that.
trans-unit.target: 此函数不带任何参数，就 Memoize 而言，它始终返回相同的结果。当然， Memoize 是错误的，此函数的已记忆版本将调用 time 一次以获取当前时间，并且此后每次调用它都会返回相同的时间。

trans-unit.source: This function takes no arguments, and as far as Memoize is concerned, it always returns the same result. Memoize is wrong, of course, and the memoized version of this function will call time once to get the current time, and it will return that same time every time you call it after that.
trans-unit.target: 此函数不带任何参数，就 Memoize 而言，它始终返回相同的结果。当然， Memoize 是错误的，该函数的记忆版本将调用 time 以获取当前时间，并且此后每次调用时都会返回相同的时间。

trans-unit.source: This function tells the thingy referenced by REF that it is now an object in the CLASSNAME package. If CLASSNAME is an empty string, it is interpreted as referring to the main package. If CLASSNAME is omitted, the current package is used. Because a bless is often the last thing in a constructor, it returns the reference for convenience. Always use the two-argument version if a derived class might inherit the method doing the blessing. See perlobj for more about the blessing (and blessings) of objects.
trans-unit.target: 该函数告诉REF所引用的事物，它现在是CLASSNAME包中的一个对象。如果CLASSNAME为空字符串，则将其解释为引用 main 包。如果省略CLASSNAME，则使用当前包。由于 bless 通常是构造函数中的最后一件事，因此为了方便起见，它会返回引用。如果派生类可以继承进行祝福的方法，请始终使用两个参数的版本。有关对象的祝福（和祝福），请参阅perlobj。

trans-unit.source: This function tells the thingy referenced by REF that it is now an object in the CLASSNAME package. If CLASSNAME is omitted, the current package is used. Because a bless is often the last thing in a constructor, it returns the reference for convenience. Always use the two-argument version if a derived class might inherit the function doing the blessing. See perlobj for more about the blessing (and blessings) of objects.
trans-unit.target: 此函数告诉REF所引用的对象它现在是CLASSNAME包中的一个对象。如果省略CLASSNAME，则使用当前包。由于 bless 通常是构造函数中的最后一件事，因此为了方便起见，它返回引用。如果派生类可能继承祝福功能，则始终使用两个参数的版本。有关对象的祝福（和祝福），请参阅perlobj。

trans-unit.source: This function tells the thingy referenced by REF that it is now an object in the CLASSNAME package. If CLASSNAME is omitted, the current package is used. Because a bless is often the last thing in a constructor, it returns the reference for convenience. Always use the two-argument version if a derived class might inherit the function doing the blessing. See perlobj for more about the blessing (and blessings) of objects.
trans-unit.target: 此函数告诉REF所引用的对象它现在是CLASSNAME包中的一个对象。如果省略CLASSNAME，则使用当前包。由于 bless 通常是构造函数中的最后一件事，因此为了方便起见，它返回引用。如果派生类可能继承祝福功能，则始终使用两个参数的版本。有关对象的祝福（和祝福），请参阅perlobj。

trans-unit.target: 此函数使用引擎盖下Module :: Load 的 load 函数或 autoload_remote 函数。

trans-unit.target: 该函数从 Sub::Name::subname 复制并重命名为该模块的命名约定。

trans-unit.source: This function was inspired by sub_fullname from Sub::Identify. The remaining functions that Sub::Identify implements can easily be emulated using regexp operations, such as
trans-unit.target: 此函数的灵感来自Sub :: Identify的 sub_fullname 。 Sub::Identify 实现的其余功能可以使用regexp操作轻松模拟，例如

trans-unit.source: This function was useful for code that wanted to handle both EBCDIC and ASCII platforms with Unicode properties, but starting in Perl v5.20, the distinctions between the platforms have mostly been made invisible to most code, so this function is quite unlikely to be what you want. If you do need this precise functionality, use instead NATIVE_TO_UNI(utf8_to_uvchr_buf(...)) or NATIVE_TO_UNI(utf8n_to_uvchr(...)).
trans-unit.target: 此功能对于希望同时处理具有Unicode属性的EBCDIC和ASCII平台的代码很有用，但是从Perl v5.20开始，大多数代码几乎看不到平台之间的区别，因此该功能不太可能是你要。如果确实需要此精确功能，请改用 NATIVE_TO_UNI(utf8_to_uvchr_buf(...)) 或 NATIVE_TO_UNI(utf8n_to_uvchr(...)) 。

trans-unit.source: This function was useful for code that wanted to handle both EBCDIC and ASCII platforms with Unicode properties, but starting in Perl v5.20, the distinctions between the platforms have mostly been made invisible to most code, so this function is quite unlikely to be what you want. If you do need this precise functionality, use instead NATIVE_TO_UNI(utf8_to_uvchr_buf(...)) or NATIVE_TO_UNI(utf8n_to_uvchr(...)).
trans-unit.target: 此功能对希望使用Unicode属性处理EBCDIC和ASCII平台的代码很有用，但是从Perl v5.20开始，大多数代码几乎看不到平台之间的区别，因此该功能不太可能是你要。如果确实需要此精确功能，请改用 NATIVE_TO_UNI(utf8_to_uvchr_buf(...)) 或 NATIVE_TO_UNI(utf8n_to_uvchr(...)) 。

trans-unit.source: This function will calculate and return the binary digest of the bytes of the given file. The function will croak if it fails to open or read the file.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将计算并返回给定文件的字节数的二进制摘要。如果无法打开或读取文件,该函数将崩溃。

trans-unit.source: This function will collect the data described in "The hash structure" below, and return that as a hash reference. It optionally accepts an option to include more entries from %ENV. See "environment" below.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将收集下面“哈希结构”中描述的数据，并将其作为哈希引用返回。它可以选择接受一个选项，以包含来自％ENV的更多条目。请参阅下面的“环境”。

trans-unit.source: This function will concatenate all arguments, calculate the MD5 digest of this "message", and return it in binary form. The returned string will be 16 bytes long.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数将连接所有参数,计算这个 "消息 "的MD5摘要,并以二进制形式返回。返回的字符串将是16个字节长。

trans-unit.source: This function will convert to UTF-8 (and not warn) even code points that aren't legal Unicode or are problematic, unless flags contains one or more of the following flags:
trans-unit.target: 除非 flags 包含以下一个或多个标志，否则该功能将转换为UTF-8（并且不会发出警告），甚至是非合法Unicode或有问题的代码点。

trans-unit.source: This function will croak if it can't connect to the syslog daemon.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能连接到syslog守护进程,这个功能就会崩溃。

trans-unit.source: This function will croak if the determined encoding isn't recognized by the Encode module.
trans-unit.target: 如果确定的编码没有被Encode模块识别,这个函数就会崩溃。

trans-unit.source: This function will not be confused by overloading or blessing. In internals terms, this extracts the regexp pointer out of the PERL_MAGIC_qr structure so it cannot be fooled.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数不会被重载或祝福所混淆。用内部术语来说,这个函数从PERL_MAGIC_qr结构中提取regexp指针,所以不会被骗。

trans-unit.source: This function will return an ANSI folder path if the long name cannot be represented in the system codepage. Use Win32::GetLongPathName() on the result of Win32::GetFolderPath() if you want the Unicode version of the folder name.
trans-unit.target: 如果长名不能在系统代码页中表示,该函数将返回一个ANSI文件夹路径。如果你想要文件夹名的Unicode版本,请在Win32::GetFolderPath()的结果上使用Win32::GetLongPathName()。

trans-unit.source: This function will split up your program into files that the AutoLoader module can handle. It is used by both the standard perl libraries and by the MakeMaker utility, to automatically configure libraries for autoloading.
trans-unit.target: 这个功能将把你的程序分割成AutoLoader模块可以处理的文件。它被标准的perl库和MakeMaker实用程序使用,以自动配置自动加载的库。

trans-unit.source: This function works like the system call by the same name: it makes the named directory the new root directory for all further pathnames that begin with a / by your process and all its children. (It doesn't change your current working directory, which is unaffected.) For security reasons, this call is restricted to the superuser. If FILENAME is omitted, does a chroot to $_.
trans-unit.target: 此函数的工作方式类似于具有相同名称的系统调用：它使命名目录成为您的进程及其所有子级以 / 开头的所有其他路径名的新根目录。（它不会更改您当前的工作目录，该目录不会受到影响。）出于安全原因，此调用仅限于超级用户。如果省略FILENAME，则对 $_ 执行 chroot 。

trans-unit.source: This function works like the system call by the same name: it makes the named directory the new root directory for all further pathnames that begin with a / by your process and all its children. (It doesn't change your current working directory, which is unaffected.) For security reasons, this call is restricted to the superuser. If FILENAME is omitted, does a chroot to $_ .
trans-unit.target: 此函数的工作方式类似于具有相同名称的系统调用：它使命名目录成为您的进程及其所有子级以 / 开头的所有其他路径名的新根目录。 （它不会更改您当前的工作目录，该目录不会受到影响。）出于安全原因，此调用仅限于超级用户。如果省略FILENAME，则对 $_ 执行 chroot 。

trans-unit.source: This function works like the system call by the same name: it makes the named directory the new root directory for all further pathnames that begin with a / by your process and all its children. (It doesn't change your current working directory, which is unaffected.) For security reasons, this call is restricted to the superuser. If FILENAME is omitted, does a chroot to $_ .

trans-unit.source: This function writes an EOF to a file handle, if the device driver supports this operation. Its primary use is to send an EOF to a subprocess through a pipe opened for writing without closing the pipe. It returns a true value if successful, and undef if it encounters an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备驱动程序支持此操作，则此函数将EOF写入文件句柄。它的主要用途是通过打开的用于写入的管道将EOF发送到子进程，而无需关闭管道。如果成功，则返回true值；如果遇到错误，则返回 undef 。

trans-unit.source: This function, if given a language tag, returns all language tags that are alternate forms of this language tag. (I.e., tags which refer to the same language.) This is meant to handle legacy tags caused by the minor changes in language tag standards over the years; and the x-/i- alternation is also dealt with.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定一个语言标签,这个函数将返回这个语言标签的所有替代形式的语言标签。(即指同一种语言的标签。)这是为了处理多年来语言标签标准的细微变化所导致的遗留标签;x-/i-交替也被处理。

trans-unit.source: This function, if given a language tag, returns an encoding of it such that:

trans-unit.source: This function, which is included in the two export tags listed above, takes one or two arguments. The first is the glob pattern. The second is a set of flags ORed together. The available flags are listed below under POSIX FLAGS. If the second argument is omitted, GLOB_CSH (or GLOB_CSH|GLOB_NOCASE on VMS and DOSish systems) is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 上面列出的两个导出标记中包含的此函数采用一个或两个参数。首先是水珠图案。第二个是一组标志进行“或”运算。可用的标志在POSIX FLAGS下列出。如果省略第二个参数，则默认使用 GLOB_CSH （或在VMS和DOSish系统上为 GLOB_CSH|GLOB_NOCASE ）。

trans-unit.source: This function, which is included in the two export tags listed above, takes one or two arguments. The first is the glob pattern. The second, if given, is a set of flags ORed together. The available flags and the default set of flags are listed below under "POSIX FLAGS".
trans-unit.target: 上面列出的两个导出标记中包含的此函数采用一个或两个参数。首先是水珠图案。第二个，如果给定的话，是一组标志或在一起的OR。可用标志和默认标志集在下面的“ POSIX FLAGS”下列出。

trans-unit.source: This functionality is disabled for setuid scripts and for scripts run with -T.
trans-unit.target: 对于setuid脚本和-T运行的脚本，此功能被禁用。

trans-unit.source: This functionality is disabled for setuid scripts, for scripts run with "-T", and for scripts run on a Perl built without -DDEBUGGING support.
trans-unit.target: 对于setuid脚本，使用“ -T”运行的脚本以及在不具有 -DDEBUGGING 支持的Perl上运行的脚本，此功能均被禁用。

trans-unit.source: This generates a compile-time error if you access a variable that was neither explicitly declared (using any of my, our, state, or use vars ) nor fully qualified. (Because this is to avoid variable suicide problems and subtle dynamic scoping issues, a merely local variable isn't good enough.) See my, our, state, local, and vars.
trans-unit.target: 如果您访问既未明确声明（使用 my ， our ， state 或 use vars ）也未完全限定的变量，则会生成编译时错误。（因为这是为了避免变量自杀问题和细微的动态作用域问题，所以仅 local 变量是不够的。）请参阅my，our，state，local和vars。

trans-unit.source: This generates a compile-time error if you access a variable that was neither explicitly declared (using any of my, our, state, or use vars) nor fully qualified. (Because this is to avoid variable suicide problems and subtle dynamic scoping issues, a merely local variable isn't good enough.) See "my" in perlfunc, "our" in perlfunc, "state" in perlfunc, "local" in perlfunc, and vars.
trans-unit.target: 如果您访问既未明确声明（使用 my ， our ， state 或 use vars ）也未完全限定的变量，则会生成编译时错误。 （因为这是为了避免变量自杀问题和细微的动态作用域问题，所以仅 local 变量是不够的。）请参见perlfunc中的“ my”，perlfunc中的“ our”，perlfunc中的“ state”，perlfunc中的“ local”和vars。

trans-unit.source: This generates a runtime error if you use symbolic references (see perlref).
trans-unit.target: 如果使用符号引用，则会生成运行时错误（请参阅perlref）。

trans-unit.target: 这给出了每个 OPp 定义的值，例如

trans-unit.source: This gives you the chance to set some default values to your fields. The only argument is $self with its indexes already set from the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这使您有机会为字段设置一些默认值。唯一的参数是 $self ，其索引已从构造函数中设置。

trans-unit.source: This global modifies the argument given to caller() by Params::Check::check() and is useful if you have a custom wrapper function around Params::Check::check() . The value must be an integer, indicating the number of wrapper functions inserted between the real function call and Params::Check::check() .
trans-unit.target: 该全局变量修改了 Params::Check::check() 给 caller() 的参数，如果您在 Params::Check::check() 周围有一个自定义包装函数，则此方法很有用。该值必须是整数，表示在实函数调用和 Params::Check::check() 之间插入的包装器函数的数量。

trans-unit.source: This global modifies the argument given to caller() by Params::Check::check() and is useful if you have a custom wrapper function around Params::Check::check(). The value must be an integer, indicating the number of wrapper functions inserted between the real function call and Params::Check::check().
trans-unit.target: 这个全局变量修改了 Params::Check::check() 给 caller() 的参数，如果您在 Params::Check::check() 周围有一个自定义包装函数，则该全局变量将很有用。该值必须是整数，指示在实函数调用和 Params::Check::check() 之间插入的包装器函数的数量。

trans-unit.source: This globally overrides the default behavior of calling exit() inside a thread, and effectively causes such calls to behave the same as threads->exit() . In other words, with this setting, calling exit() causes only the thread to terminate.
trans-unit.target: 这将全局覆盖在线程内调用 exit() 的默认行为，并有效地导致此类调用的行为与 threads->exit() 。换句话说，使用此设置，调用 exit() 只会导致线程终止。

trans-unit.source: This globally overrides the default behavior of calling exit() inside a thread, and effectively causes such calls to behave the same as threads->exit(). In other words, with this setting, calling exit() causes only the thread to terminate.
trans-unit.target: 这将全局覆盖在线程内调用 exit() 的默认行为，并有效地导致此类调用的行为与 threads->exit() 。换句话说，使用此设置，调用 exit() 只会导致线程终止。

trans-unit.source: This guarantees that STDOUT (where the test results appear) and STDERR (where the diagnostics appear) will stay in sync. The harness will display any diagnostics your tests emit on STDERR.
trans-unit.target: 这保证了STDOUT(显示测试结果的地方)和STDERR(显示诊断程序的地方)将保持同步。线束将在STDERR上显示您的测试发出的任何诊断程序。

trans-unit.source: This guide assumes you have obtained a prebuilt archive from os4depot.net.
trans-unit.target: 本指南假设你已经从os4depot.net获得了一个预建的存档。

trans-unit.source: This had Test::Builder2 conditionals. This was fixed by removing the conditionals.
trans-unit.target: 这有Test::Builder2条件。这一点通过删除条件而得到了修正。

trans-unit.source: This happened because the presence of overloading was checked too early, before any tie()d access was attempted. If the class of the value FETCH()ed from the tied variable does not change, a simple workaround for code that is to run on older Perl versions is to access the value (via () = $foo or some such) immediately after tie()ing, so that after this call the
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况的原因是，在尝试进行任何tie（）d访问之前，都太早检查了过载的存在。如果从绑定变量获取的值FETCH（）的类未更改，则在较早的Perl版本上运行的代码的一种简单解决方法是：在绑定后立即访问值（通过 () = $foo 或诸如此类） （）ing，以便在此调用之后

trans-unit.source: This happens because Berkeley DB uses dynamic memory to allocate buffers which will subsequently be written to the database file. Being dynamic, the memory could have been used for anything before DB malloced it. As Berkeley DB doesn't clear the memory once it has been allocated, the unused portions will contain random junk. In the case where a Perl script gets written to the database, the random junk will correspond to an area of dynamic memory that happened to be used during the compilation of the script.
trans-unit.target: 之所以会发生这种情况,是因为Berkeley DB使用动态内存来分配缓冲区,缓冲区随后将被写入数据库文件。由于是动态的,在DB malloced之前,内存可能已经被用于任何事情。由于Berkeley DB一旦分配了内存,就不会清除内存,因此未使用的部分将包含随机的垃圾。在Perl脚本被写入数据库的情况下,随机垃圾将对应于脚本编译过程中碰巧被使用的动态内存区域。

trans-unit.source: This happens because is_deeply will unoverload all arguments unconditionally. It is probably best not to use is_deeply with overloading. For legacy reasons this is not likely to ever be fixed. If you would like a much better tool for this you should see Test2::Suite Specifically Test2::Tools::Compare has an is() function that works like is_deeply with many improvements.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况是因为is_deeply将无条件地重载所有参数。最好不要对重载使用is_deeply。由于遗留原因，这不可能永远得到解决。如果您想要一个更好的工具，则应查看Test2 :: Suite特定于Test2 :: Tools :: Compare的 is() 函数，其功能与 is_deeply 相似，但有很多改进。

trans-unit.source: This has the effect of storing the cache in a DB_File database whose name is in $filename . The cache will persist after the program has exited. Next time the program runs, it will find the cache already populated from the previous run of the program. Or you can forcibly populate the cache by constructing a batch program that runs in the background and populates the cache file. Then when you come to run your real program the memoized function will be fast because all its results have been precomputed.
trans-unit.target: 这具有将缓存存储在名称为 $filename 的 DB_File 数据库中的效果。程序退出后，缓存将继续存在。下次该程序运行时，它将找到该程序的上一次运行已填充的缓存。或者，您可以通过构造一个在后台运行并填充缓存文件的批处理程序来强制填充缓存。然后，当您开始运行真实程序时，由于所有功能的结果均已预先计算，因此记忆功能将很快。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that Configure is being run with a broken Korn shell (even though you think you are using a Bourne shell by using "sh Configure" or "./Configure"). The Korn shell bug has been reported to Compaq as of February 1999 but in the meanwhile, the reason ksh is being used is that you have the environment variable BIN_SH set to 'xpg4'. This causes /bin/sh to delegate its duties to /bin/posix/sh (a ksh). Unset the environment variable and rerun Configure.
trans-unit.target: 这表明配置是用一个损坏的Korn shell运行的(即使你认为你使用 "sh Configure "或"./Configure "使用的是Bourne shell)。从1999年2月起,Korn shell的错误已经被报告给康柏公司,但与此同时,使用ksh的原因是你将环境变量BIN_SH设置为 "xpg4"。这将导致/bin/sh将其职责委托给/bin/posix/sh(一个ksh)。取消设置环境变量,重新运行配置。

trans-unit.source: This instance of this layer supports the "fast gets " interface. Normally set based on PERLIO_K_FASTGETS for the class and by the existence of the function(s) in the table. However a class that normally provides that interface may need to avoid it on a particular instance. The "pending" layer needs to do this when it is pushed above a layer which does not support the interface. (Perl's sv_gets() does not expect the streams fast gets behaviour to change during one "get".)
trans-unit.target: 该层的实例支持“快速 gets ”接口。通常根据类的 PERLIO_K_FASTGETS 以及表中函数的存在来进行设置。但是，通常提供该接口的类可能需要在特定实例上避免使用该接口。当“待定”层被推到不支持该接口的层上方时，需要执行此操作。（Perl的 sv_gets() 并不希望流快速 gets 行为在一个“获取”期间发生变化。）

The "pending" layer needs to do this when it is pushed above a layer which does not support the interface. trans-unit.source: This integer normally starts off at a value of 1 when a package stash is instantiated. Calling it on packages whose stashes do not exist at all will return 0 . If a package stash is completely deleted (not a normal occurrence, but it can happen if someone does something like undef %PkgName:: ), the number will be reset to either 0 or 1 , depending on how completely the package was wiped out.
trans-unit.target: 实例化包存储时，此整数通常以 1 开头。在根本没有任何隐藏的包上调用它会返回 0 。如果一个软件包的存储被完全删除（这不是正常现象，但是如果有人执行 undef %PkgName:: 这类操作则可能发生），则该数字将重置为 0 或 1 ，具体取决于软件包被清除的方式。

trans-unit.source: This interface lets you treat the DCL symbol table as a Perl associative array, in which the key of each element is the symbol name, and the value of the element is that symbol's value. Case is not significant in the key string, as DCL converts symbol names to uppercase, but it is significant in the value string. All of the usual operations on associative arrays are supported. Reading an element retrieves the current value of the symbol, assigning to it defines a new symbol (or overwrites the old value of an existing symbol), and deleting an element deletes the corresponding symbol. Setting an element to undef, or undefing it directly, sets the corresponding symbol to the null string. You may also read the special keys ':GLOBAL' and ':LOCAL' to find out whether a default symbol table has been specified for this hash (see the next paragraph), or set either or these keys to specify a default symbol table.
trans-unit.target: 该接口使您可以将DCL符号表视为Perl关联数组，其中每个元素的键是符号名称，而元素的值就是该符号的值。密钥字符串中的大小写不重要，因为DCL将符号名称转换为大写，但在值字符串中则重要。支持对关联数组的所有常规操作。读取元素会检索符号的当前值，为其分配定义一个新符号（或覆盖现有符号的旧值），删除元素会删除相应的符号。将元素设置为 undef 或 undef 直接对其进行设置，将相应的符号设置为空字符串。您也可以阅读特殊键'：GLOBAL'和'：LOCAL'来确定是否为此哈希指定了默认符号表（请参阅下一段），或设置其中一个或这些键以指定默认符号表。

trans-unit.source: This interpolation combines with the facts that the opening and closing parentheses are optional (except when necessary for precedence) and lists may end with an optional comma to mean that multiple commas within lists are legal syntax. The list 1,,3 is a concatenation of two lists, 1, and 3 , the first of which ends with that optional comma. 1,,3 is (1,),(3) is 1,3 (And similarly for 1,,,3 is (1,),(,),3 is 1,3 and so on.) Not that we'd advise you to use this obfuscation.
trans-unit.target: 此插值法与以下事实结合在一起：左括号和右括号是可选的（优先级除外），列表可能以可选的逗号结尾，表示列表中的多个逗号是合法语法。列表 1,,3 是两个列表 1, 和 3 的串联，其中第一个以该可选的逗号结尾。 1,,3 是 (1,),(3) 是 1,3 （类似地，对于 1,,,3 是 (1,),(,),3 是 1,3 ，依此类推。）不是我们d建议您使用这种混淆处理。

Not that we'd advise you to use this obfuscation.

trans-unit.source: This introduces another problem: what if you just know that your data is UTF-16, but you don't know which endianness? Byte Order Marks, or BOM 's, are a solution to this. A special character has been reserved in Unicode to function as a byte order marker: the character with the code point U+FEFF is the BOM .
trans-unit.target: 这带来了另一个问题：如果仅知道您的数据是UTF-16，但不知道哪个字节顺序怎么办？字节顺序标记或 BOM 是解决此问题的方法。 Unicode中已保留一个特殊字符以用作字节顺序标记：代码点为 U+FEFF 的字符是 BOM 。

trans-unit.source: This is Perl, so it does the exact right thing. It sees that you want to push Athens onto an array that doesn't exist, so it helpfully makes a new, empty, anonymous array for you, installs it into %table , and then pushes Athens onto it. This is called 'autovivification'--bringing things to life automatically. Perl saw that the key wasn't in the hash, so it created a new hash entry automatically. Perl saw that you wanted to use the hash value as an array, so it created a new empty array and installed a reference to it in the hash automatically. And as usual, Perl made the array one element longer to hold the new city name.
trans-unit.target: 这是Perl，所以它做的很正确。它看到您想将 Athens 推送到一个不存在的数组上，因此它会为您创建一个新的空的匿名数组，将其安装到 %table 中，然后将 Athens 推送到该数组上。这就是所谓的“自我生存”，即自动将事物带入生活。Perl看到密钥不在哈希中，因此它自动创建了一个新的哈希条目。Perl看到您想将哈希值用作数组，因此它创建了一个新的空数组，并在哈希中自动安装了对它的引用。和往常一样，Perl将数组的元素长度增加了一个，以容纳新的城市名称。

trans-unit.target: 这是Perl，所以它做的很正确。它看到您想将 Athens 推送到一个不存在的数组上，因此它会为您创建一个新的空的匿名数组，将其安装到 %table 中，然后将 Athens 推送到该数组上。这就是所谓的

trans-unit.source: This is a Map that describes all the prerequisites of the distribution. The keys are phases of activity, such as configure, build, test or runtime. Values are Maps in which the keys name the type of prerequisite relationship such as requires, recommends, or suggests and the value provides a set of prerequisite relations. The set of relations must be specified as a Map of package names to version ranges.

trans-unit.source: This is a Perl binding for the cross-platform wxWidgets toolkit ( http://www.wxwidgets.org ). It works under Unix, Win32 and Mac OS X, using native widgets (Gtk under Unix). trans-unit.source: This is a big step forward, and can give a threaded program quite a performance boost over non-threaded programs. Threads that block performing I/O, for example, won't block threads that are doing other things. Each process still has only one thread running at once, though, regardless of how many CPUs a system might have.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个很大的进步,可以让线程程序的性能比非线程程序提升不少。例如,阻塞执行I/O的线程,不会阻塞正在做其他事情的线程。不过无论系统有多少个CPU,每个进程仍然只有一个线程同时运行。

trans-unit.source: This is a class method that constructs a Pod::InteriorSequence object and returns a reference to the new interior sequence object. It should be given two keyword arguments. The -ldelim keyword indicates the corresponding left-delimiter of the interior sequence (e.g. '<'). The -name keyword indicates the name of the corresponding interior sequence command, such as I or B or C . The -file and -line keywords indicate the filename and line number corresponding to the beginning of the interior sequence. If the $ptree argument is given, it must be the last argument, and it must be either string, or else an array-ref suitable for passing to Pod::ParseTree::new (or it may be a reference to a Pod::ParseTree object).
trans-unit.target: 这是一个构造 Pod::InteriorSequence 对象并返回对新内部序列对象的引用的类方法。应该给它两个关键字参数。所述 -ldelim 关键字指示内部序列的对应的左分隔符（例如“<”）。所述 -name 关键字指示相应的内部序列命令，如名称 I 或 B 或 C 。该 -file 和 -line 关键字指示对应于内部序列开始的文件名和行号。如果 $ptree 给定参数，它必须是最后一个参数，并且必须是字符串，或者是适合传递给Pod :: ParseTree :: new的array-ref （或者可以是对Pod :: ParseTree对象的引用） 。

trans-unit.source: This is a classic race condition: you take two steps to do something which must be done in one. That's why computer hardware provides an atomic test-and-set instruction. In theory, this "ought" to work:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个典型的竞赛条件:你用两步来做必须一步完成的事情。这就是为什么计算机硬件提供了一个原子测试和设置指令。理论上,这 "应该 "是可行的。

trans-unit.source: This is a combination of the previous two forms. It is valid only when not under "use utf8" (normal identifier rules apply when under "use utf8"). The form is a sigil, followed by text in braces, where the first character is any one of the characters in the range [\x80-\xFF] followed by ASCII word characters up to the trailing brace.
trans-unit.target: 这是前两种形式的组合。仅当不在 "use utf8" 下时有效（正常标识符规则在 "use utf8" 下时适用）。形式为符号，后跟大括号中的文本，其中第一个字符是 [\x80-\xFF] 范围内的任意一个字符，后跟ASCII文字字符，直至尾随大括号。

trans-unit.source: This is a function which adds a string, ptr , of length len onto the end of the PV stored in sv . The first thing we do in line 6 is make sure that the SV has a valid PV, by calling the SvPV_force macro to force a PV. As a side effect, tlen gets set to the current value of the PV, and the PV itself is returned to junk .
trans-unit.target: 此函数将长度为 len 的字符串 ptr 添加到 sv 中存储的PV的末尾。在第6行中，我们要做的第一件事是通过调用 SvPV_force 宏强制PV来确保SV 具有有效的PV。副作用是，将 tlen 设置为PV的当前值，并且PV本身返回给 junk 。

trans-unit.source: This is a function which adds a string, ptr, of length len onto the end of the PV stored in sv. The first thing we do in line 6 is make sure that the SV has a valid PV, by calling the SvPV_force macro to force a PV. As a side effect, tlen gets set to the current value of the PV, and the PV itself is returned to junk.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将长度为 len 的字符串 ptr 添加到存储在 sv 中的PV的末尾。在第6行中，我们要做的第一件事是通过调用 SvPV_force 宏强制PV来确保SV具有有效的PV。副作用是，将 tlen 设置为PV的当前值，并且PV本身返回到 junk 。

trans-unit.source: This is a fundamental limitation of the way hashes are constructed in Perl. The error messages produced when this happens will often be quite cryptic -- in the worst case there may be none at all, and you'll only later find that something is broken.
trans-unit.target: 这是Perl中构造哈希的方式的一个基本限制。当这种情况发生时,产生的错误信息通常是相当神秘的 --在最坏的情况下,可能根本没有任何错误信息,你只会在后来发现有些东西被破坏了。

trans-unit.source: This is a generic event that lets you customize all fields in the event API. This is useful if you have need for a custom event that does not make sense as a published reusable event subclass.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个通用事件,可以让你自定义事件API中的所有字段。如果你需要一个自定义的事件,而这个事件作为一个发布的可重用的事件子类是没有意义的,那么这个事件就很有用。

trans-unit.source: This is a get-or-set method for the compartment's operator mask.
trans-unit.target: 这是隔间的操作面具的获取或设置方法。

trans-unit.source: This is a good introduction and will direct you towards other man pages that may interest you.
trans-unit.target: 这是个很好的介绍,会引导你去看其他你可能感兴趣的男人网页。

trans-unit.source: This is a hash reference which contains a template as explained in the SYNOPSIS and Template section.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个哈希参考，其中包含一个模板，如“ SYNOPSIS 和“ Template 部分所述。

trans-unit.source: This is a hash used internally to track named capture groups and their offsets. The keys are the names of the buffers the values are dualvars, with the IV slot holding the number of buffers with the given name and the pv being an embedded array of I32. The values may also be contained independently in the data array in cases where named backreferences are used.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个内部使用的哈希值,用于跟踪命名的捕获组和它们的偏移量。键是缓冲区的名称,值是双变量,IV槽是给定名称的缓冲区数量,pv是I32的嵌入式数组。在使用命名后引用的情况下,这些值也可以独立包含在数据数组中。

trans-unit.source: This is a hash with all the known defines as keys. The value is either 0, which means unknown or unset, or 1, which means defined.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个以所有已知定义为键的哈希值。该值要么是0,表示未知或未设置,要么是1,表示定义。

trans-unit.source: This is a hashref of module/version pairs. The version indicates the minimum version to load. If no version is provided, any version is assumed to be good enough.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个模块/版本对的哈希夫。版本表示要加载的最小版本。如果没有提供版本,则认为任何版本都足够好。

trans-unit.source: This is a hashref registering what modules/utilities were known to fail for fetching files (mostly because they weren't installed).
trans-unit.target: 这是个哈希夫,记录了哪些模块/实用程序在获取文件时失败(主要是因为它们没有安装)。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper macro to avoid preprocessor issues, replaced by nothing unless under DEBUGGING, where it expands to an assert of its argument, followed by a comma (hence the comma operator). If we just used a straight assert(), we would get a comma with nothing before it when not DEBUGGING.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个避免预处理器问题的辅助宏,除非在DEBUGGING下,否则被nothing代替,在DEBUGGING下,它扩展为对其参数的断言,后面是逗号(因此是逗号操作符)。如果我们只是直接使用 assert(),在不 DEBUGGING 时,我们会得到一个逗号,前面什么都没有。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper module for ExtUtils::Typemaps for quick one-liners, specifically for inclusion of shared typemaps that live on CPAN into an XS file (see SYNOPSIS).
trans-unit.target: 这是ExtUtils :: Typemaps的帮助程序模块，用于快速创建单行代码，专门用于将生活在CPAN上的共享类型图包含到XS文件中（请参阅提要）。

trans-unit.source: This is a hook called by Test2::IPC::Driver->abort(). This is your chance to cleanup when an abort happens. You cannot prevent the abort, but you can gracefully except it.
trans-unit.target: 这是 Test2::IPC::Driver->abort() 调用的钩子。这是您中止发生时进行清理的机会。您无法阻止中止，但是可以优雅地进行中止。

trans-unit.source: This is a list of cpan modules that have been known to have been broken by the upgrade at one point.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个已知在某一时刻被升级破坏的cpan模块列表。

trans-unit.source: This is a list of optionally locally applied patches. Default is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个可选的本地应用补丁的列表。默认是一个空列表。

trans-unit.source: This is a list of questions and answers about Unicode in Perl, intended to be read after perlunitut.
trans-unit.target: 这是Perl中有关Unicode的问答列表，打算在perlunitut之后阅读。

trans-unit.source: This is a little bit more complex in the case of UTF-8, see what Perl_reg_numbered_buff_length does with is_utf8_string_loclen.
trans-unit.target: 对于UTF-8，这有点复杂，请参阅 Perl_reg_numbered_buff_length 对is_utf8_string_loclen的作用。

trans-unit.source: This is a macro that evaluates to a string constant of the UTF-8 bytes that define the Unicode BYTE ORDER MARK (U+FEFF) for the platform that perl is compiled on. This allows code to use a mnemonic for this character that works on both ASCII and EBCDIC platforms. sizeof(BOM_UTF8) - 1 can be used to get its length in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个宏，其结果取值为UTF-8字节的字符串常量，该字符串常量定义了在其上编译perl的平台的Unicode BYTE ORDER MARK（U + FEFF）。这允许代码对该字符使用助记符，该助记符在ASCII和EBCDIC平台上均可使用。 sizeof(BOM_UTF8) - 1 可用于获取其长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This is a macro that evaluates to a string constant of the UTF-8 bytes that define the Unicode REPLACEMENT CHARACTER (U+FFFD) for the platform that perl is compiled on. This allows code to use a mnemonic for this character that works on both ASCII and EBCDIC platforms. sizeof(REPLACEMENT_CHARACTER_UTF8) - 1 can be used to get its length in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个宏，其结果为UTF-8字节的字符串常量，该字符串常量定义了在其上编译perl的平台的Unicode REPLACEMENT CHARACTER（U + FFFD）。这允许代码对该字符使用助记符，该助记符在ASCII和EBCDIC平台上均可使用。 sizeof(REPLACEMENT_CHARACTER_UTF8) - 1 可用于获取其长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This is a message from your shell telling you that the command 'ar' was not found. You need to check your PATH environment variable to make sure that it includes the directory with the 'ar' command. This is a common problem on Solaris, where 'ar' is in the /usr/ccs/bin/ directory.
trans-unit.target: 这是你的shell发出的信息,告诉你没有找到'ar'命令。你需要检查你的PATH环境变量,以确保它包括'ar'命令的目录。这是Solaris上常见的问题,因为'ar'在/usr/ccs/bin/目录下。

trans-unit.source: This is a misleadingly-named synonym for is_invariant_string. On ASCII-ish platforms, the name isn't misleading: the ASCII-range characters are exactly the UTF-8 invariants. But EBCDIC machines have more invariants than just the ASCII characters, so is_invariant_string is preferred.
trans-unit.target: 这是is_invariant_string的具有误导性的同义词。在ASCII平台上，该名称不会引起误解：ASCII范围字符恰好是UTF-8不变式。但是EBCDIC机器不仅仅具有ASCII字符而具有更多的不变量，因此 is_invariant_string 是首选。

trans-unit.source: This is a misleadingly-named synonym for "is_utf8_invariant_string". On ASCII-ish platforms, the name isn't misleading: the ASCII-range characters are exactly the UTF-8 invariants. But EBCDIC machines have more invariants than just the ASCII characters, so is_utf8_invariant_string is preferred.
trans-unit.target: 这是“ is_utf8_invariant_string”的一个具有误导性的同义词。在ASCII平台上，该名称不会引起误解：ASCII范围字符恰好是UTF-8不变式。但是EBCDIC机器不仅仅具有ASCII字符，还具有更多的不变性，因此 is_utf8_invariant_string 是首选。

trans-unit.source: This is a no-op on Win32.
trans-unit.target: 这在Win32上是不可能的。

trans-unit.source: This is a noop provided for completeness.
trans-unit.target: 这是为完整而提供的noop。

trans-unit.source: This is a perl-friendly wrapper for the SetFilePointer API (below). $ivOffset can be a 64 bit integer or Math::BigInt object if your Perl doesn't have 64 bit integers. The return value is the new offset and will likewise be a 64 bit integer or a Math::BigInt object.
trans-unit.target: 这是SetFilePointer API的Perl友好包装器（如下）。如果您的Perl没有64位整数，则 $ivOffset 可以是64位整数或 Math::BigInt 对象。返回值是新的偏移量，并且将同样是64位整数或 Math::BigInt 对象。

trans-unit.source: This is a placeholder option.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个占位选项。

trans-unit.source: This is a port of Perl 5.22.1, it is a fresh port and not in any way compatible with my previous ports of Perl 5.8 and 5.16.3. This means you will need to reinstall / rebuild any third party modules you have installed.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个 Perl 5.22.1 的移植版本,它是一个全新的移植版本,与我之前的 Perl 5.8 和 5.16.3 不兼容。这意味着您需要重新安装/重建您已经安装的任何第三方模块。

trans-unit.source: This is a ported perl for the POSIX subsystem in BS2000 VERSION OSD V3.1A or later. It may work on other versions, but we started porting and testing it with 3.1A and are currently using Version V4.0A.
trans-unit.target: 这是为BS2000 VERSION OSD V3.1A或更高版本的POSIX子系统移植的perl。它可能会在其他版本上工作,但我们从3.1A开始移植和测试它,目前使用的是V4.0A版本。

trans-unit.source: This is a protocol used by some firewall ftp proxies. It is used to authorise the user to send data out. If both arguments are not specified then authorize uses Net::Netrc to do a lookup.
trans-unit.target: 这是某些防火墙ftp代理使用的协议。它用于授权用户发送数据。如果两个参数都未指定，则 authorize 使用 Net::Netrc 进行查找。

trans-unit.source: This is a quick reference to Perl's regular expressions. For full information see perlre and perlop, as well as the "SEE ALSO" section in this document.
trans-unit.target: 这是对Perl正则表达式的快速参考。有关完整信息，请参见perlre和perlop，以及本文档中的“另请参阅”部分。

trans-unit.source: This is a quick reference to Perl's regular expressions. For full information see perlre and perlop, as well as the SEE ALSO section in this document.
trans-unit.target: 这是对Perl正则表达式的快速参考。有关完整信息，请参见perlre和perlop，以及本文档中的“ 另请参阅”部分。

trans-unit.source: This is a re-implementation of stdio-like buffering written as a PerlIO layer. As such it will call whatever layer is below it for its operations, typically :unix .
trans-unit.target: 这是写为PerlIO层的类stdio缓冲的重新实现。这样，它将调用其下面的任何层进行操作，通常是 :unix 。

trans-unit.source: This is a re-implementation of stdio-like buffering written as a PerlIO layer. As such it will call whatever layer is below it for its operations, typically :unix.

trans-unit.source: This is a reference card for people who are familiar with the C library and who want to do things the Perl way; to tell them which functions they ought to use instead of the more normal C functions.
trans-unit.target: 这是为那些熟悉C库,但又想用Perl方式做事的人准备的参考卡片;告诉他们应该使用哪些函数,而不是更普通的C函数。

trans-unit.target: 这是对需要检查的命名参数的哈希的引用。

trans-unit.source: This is a replacement for an earlier Pod::Text module written by Tom Christiansen. It has a revamped interface, since it now uses Pod::Parser, but an interface roughly compatible with the old Pod::Text::pod2text() function is still available. Please change to the new calling convention, though.
trans-unit.target: 这是Tom Christiansen编写的早期Pod::Text模块的替代品。它有一个全新的界面,因为它现在使用了Pod::Parser,但是一个与旧的Pod::Text::pod2text()函数大致兼容的界面仍然可用。不过请改成新的调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a replacement for an earlier Pod::Text module written by Tom Christiansen. It has a revamped interface, since it now uses Pod::Simple, but an interface roughly compatible with the old Pod::Text::pod2text() function is still available. Please change to the new calling convention, though.
trans-unit.target: 这是Tom Christiansen编写的早期Pod::Text模块的替代品。它有一个全新的界面,因为它现在使用了Pod::Simple,但是一个与旧的Pod::Text::pod2text()函数大致兼容的界面仍然可用。不过请改成新的调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a runtime equivalent to \N{...} .
trans-unit.target: 这是等效于 \N{...} 的运行时。

trans-unit.source: This is a runtime equivalent to \N{...}.
trans-unit.target: 这是等效于 \N{...} 的运行时。

trans-unit.source: This is a safer version of "UTF8SKIP", but still not as safe as "UTF8_SAFE_SKIP". This version doesn't blindly assume that the input string pointed to by s is well-formed, but verifies that there isn't a NUL terminating character before the expected end of the next character in s. The length UTF8_CHK_SKIP returns stops just before any such NUL.
trans-unit.target: 这是“ UTF8SKIP ”的安全版本，但仍不如“ UTF8_SAFE_SKIP ”安全。此版本不会盲目地假设 s 指向的输入字符串格式正确，但会验证 s 中下一个字符的预期结尾之前没有NUL终止字符。 UTF8_CHK_SKIP 返回的长度恰好在任何此类NUL之前停止。

trans-unit.source: This is a set of four-letter (capitalized) codes from ISO 15924 such as 'Phnx' for Phoenician. It also includes additions to this set included in the IANA language registry.
trans-unit.target: 这是一套来自ISO 15924的四字母(大写)代码,如腓尼基语的 "Phnx"。它还包括列入IANA语言登记册的这套代码的补充内容。

trans-unit.source: This is a set of three-digit numeric codes from ISO 15924 such as 115 for Phoenician.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组来自ISO 15924的三位数数字代码,如115代表腓尼基人。

trans-unit.source: This is a set of three-letter (uppercase) codes from ISO 4217 such as EUR for Euro.

trans-unit.source: This is a simple base class used by TAP::Parser to store objects that represent the current bit of test output data from TAP (usually a single line). Unless you're subclassing, you probably won't need to use this module directly.

trans-unit.source: This is achieved by creating separate watchdog process which spawns the specified program in a separate process session and supervises it: optionally feeds it with input, stores its exit code, stdout and stderr, terminates it in case it runs longer than specified.
trans-unit.target: 这是通过创建单独的看门狗进程来实现的,看门狗进程在一个单独的进程会话中生成指定的程序,并监督它:有选择地给它提供输入,存储它的退出代码、stdout和stderr,在它运行的时间超过指定时间时终止它。

trans-unit.source: This is an (almost) drop-in replacement for the system setlocale(3), taking the same parameters, and returning the same information, except that it returns the correct underlying LC_NUMERIC locale. Regular setlocale will instead return C if the underlying locale has a non-dot decimal point character, or a non-empty thousands separator for displaying floating point numbers. This is because perl keeps that locale category such that it has a dot and empty separator, changing the locale briefly during the operations where the underlying one is required. Perl_setlocale knows about this, and compensates; regular setlocale doesn't.
trans-unit.target: 这（几乎）是对系统 setlocale(3) 的直接替代，采用相同的参数并返回相同的信息，只是它返回了正确的基础 LC_NUMERIC 区域设置。如果基础语言环境具有非点小数点字符或用于显示浮点数的非空千位分隔符，则常规 setlocale 将返回 C 。这是因为perl会保留该区域设置类别，使其具有点和空分隔符，从而在需要基础区域的操作期间短暂更改区域设置。 Perl_setlocale 知道这一点并进行补偿；常规的 setlocale 没有。

trans-unit.source: This is an (almost) drop-in replacement for the system nl_langinfo(3), taking the same item parameter values, and returning the same information. But it is more thread-safe than regular nl_langinfo(), and hides the quirks of Perl's locale handling from your code, and can be used on systems that lack a native nl_langinfo.
trans-unit.target: 这是对 nl_langinfo(3) 系统的（几乎）直接替代，采用相同的 item 参数值，并返回相同的信息。但是它比常规的 nl_langinfo() 更线程安全，并且在代码中隐藏了Perl语言环境处理的怪癖，并且可以在缺少本地 nl_langinfo 的系统上使用。

trans-unit.source: This is an alternate constructor for a CPAN::Meta::Requirements object. It takes a hash of module names and version requirement strings and returns a new CPAN::Meta::Requirements object. As with add_string_requirement, a version can be a Perl "v-string". Optionally, you can supply a hash-reference of options, exactly as with the "new" method.
trans-unit.target: 这是CPAN :: Meta :: Requirements对象的备用构造函数。它采用模块名称和版本要求字符串的哈希值，并返回一个新的CPAN :: Meta :: Requirements对象。与add_string_requirement一样，版本可以是Perl的“ v-string”。（可选）您可以提供选项的哈希引用，与“ new”方法完全相同。

trans-unit.source: This is an extremely simple, extremely basic module for writing tests suitable for CPAN modules and other pursuits. If you wish to do more complicated testing, use the Test::More module (a drop-in replacement for this one).

trans-unit.source: This is an internal function used by formats, though you may call it, too. It formats (see perlform) a list of values according to the contents of PICTURE, placing the output into the format output accumulator, $^A (or $ACCUMULATOR in English). Eventually, when a write is done, the contents of $^A are written to some filehandle. You could also read $^A and then set $^A back to "". Note that a format typically does one formline per line of form, but the formline function itself doesn't care how many newlines are embedded in the PICTURE. This means that the ~ and ~~ tokens treat the entire PICTURE as a single line. You may therefore need to use multiple formlines to implement a single record format, just like the format compiler.
trans-unit.target: 这是 format s使用的内部函数，尽管您也可以调用它。它格式（见perlform根据图像的内容）的值的列表，将输出到输出格式累加器， $^A （或 $ACCUMULATOR 在英国）。最终，完成 write 操作后， $^A 的内容将被写到某个文件句柄中。您还可以阅读 $^A ，然后将 $^A 设置回 "" 。需要注意的是格式通常做一个 formline 每个表格的行，但 formline 函数本身并不关心在PICTURE中嵌入了多少换行符。这意味着 ~ 和 ~~ 标记将整个PICTURE视为一行。因此，与 format 编译器一样，您可能需要使用多个格式行来实现单个记录格式。

trans-unit.source: This is an internal function used by formats, though you may call it, too. Eventually, when a write is done, the contents of $^A are written to some filehandle. You could also read $^A and then set $^A back to "" . Note that a format typically does one formline per line of form, but the formline function itself doesn't care how many newlines are embedded in the PICTURE. This means that the ~ and ~~ tokens treat the entire PICTURE as a single line. You may therefore need to use multiple formlines to implement a single record format, just like the format compiler.

trans-unit.source: This is an introduction to the use of performance and optimization techniques which can be used with particular reference to perl programs. While many perl developers have come from other languages, and can use their prior knowledge where appropriate, there are many other people who might benefit from a few perl specific pointers. If you want the condensed version, perhaps the best advice comes from the renowned Japanese Samurai, Miyamoto Musashi, who said:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个关于性能和优化技术使用的介绍,可以特别参考perl程序。虽然许多perl开发人员来自其他语言,可以在适当的地方使用他们之前的知识,但也有许多其他人可能会从一些perl特定的指针中受益。如果你想要精简版,也许最好的建议来自日本著名的武士宫本武藏,他说。

trans-unit.source: This is bad because splice is already O(N), and since you do it N times, you just invented a quadratic algorithm; that is, O(N**2). This does not scale, although Perl is so efficient that you probably won't notice this until you have rather largish arrays.
trans-unit.target: 这很糟糕,因为拼接已经是O(N)了,而且由于你做了N次,你只是发明了一个二次元算法;也就是说,O(N**2)。这并不具有扩展性,尽管Perl的效率很高,你可能不会注意到这一点,直到你有了相当大的数组。

trans-unit.source: This is basically shorthand for saying:
trans-unit.target: 这基本上是速记的说法。

trans-unit.source: This is because math with overloaded operators follows the first (dominating) operand, and the operation of that is called and returns thus the result. So, Math::BigInt::bdiv() will always return a Math::BigInt, regardless whether the result should be a Math::BigFloat or the second operant is one.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为具有重载操作符的数学遵循第一个(支配性)操作符,并调用该操作符的操作,从而返回结果。所以,Math::BigInt::bdiv()总是会返回一个Math::BigInt,不管结果应该是一个Math::BigFloat还是第二个操作数是一个。

trans-unit.source: This is because named subroutines are created at compile time so their lexical variables get assigned to the parent lexicals from the first execution of the parent block. If a parent scope is entered a second time, its lexicals are created again, while the nested subs still reference the old ones.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为命名的子程序是在编译时创建的,所以它们的词法变量会在第一次执行父块时被分配给父词法。如果第二次输入父作用域,它的词法会被再次创建,而嵌套的子程序仍然引用旧的子程序。

trans-unit.source: This is best demonstrated by example. Normally copy-on-write will prevent the substitution from operator from using this hack, but if you can craft a string for which copy-on-write is not possible, you can see it in play. In the current implementation, the final byte of a string buffer is used as a copy-on-write reference count. If the buffer is not big enough, then copy-on-write is skipped. First have a look at an empty string:
trans-unit.target: 这是最好的例子。一般来说,copy-on-write会阻止操作者使用这个黑客进行替换,但是如果你可以制作一个不可能copy-on-write的字符串,你可以看到它的作用。在当前的实现中,字符串缓冲区的最后一个字节被用作写后复制的引用计数。如果缓冲区不够大,那么就会跳过copy-on-write。首先来看一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This is called by ->new to initialize newly-constructed language handles. If you define an init method in your class, remember that it's usually considered a good idea to call $lh->SUPER::init in it (presumably at the beginning), so that all classes get a chance to initialize a new object however they see fit.
trans-unit.target: 这由-> new调用，以初始化新构造的语言句柄。如果您在类中定义了一个init方法，请记住通常在其中调用$ lh-> SUPER :: init是一个好主意（大概是在开始时），以便所有类都有机会初始化一个新对象。他们认为合适。

trans-unit.source: This is called by send after it does any IPC handling. You can use this to bypass the IPC process, but in general you should avoid using this.
trans-unit.target: 这是在send进行任何IPC处理后调用的。你可以用它来绕过IPC过程,但一般来说,你应该避免使用它。

trans-unit.source: This is called in the parent process when it is complete and waiting for all child processes and threads to complete.

trans-unit.target: 在启动一个新的词法作用域之后,就会调用这个函数。请注意,像这样的 Perl 代码

trans-unit.target: 在建立 eval STRING ，就在开始编译eval STRING， do FILE ， require 或 use 之前调用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 在建立 eval STRING ，就在开始编译eval STRING， do FILE ， require 或 use 之前调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This is called just like any other method, with the object as the first argument. It does not receive any additional arguments. However, the $_[0] variable will be read-only in the destructor, so you cannot assign a value to it.
trans-unit.target: 就像任何其他方法一样，以对象作为第一个参数来调用它。它不接收任何其他参数。但是， $_[0] 变量在析构函数中将是只读的，因此您不能为其分配值。

trans-unit.source: This is called when untie occurs. See The untie Gotcha below.
trans-unit.target: 发生 untie 时称为此事件。请参阅下面的解开陷阱。

trans-unit.source: This is called when untie occurs. See "The untie Gotcha" below.
trans-unit.target: 发生 untie 时称为此事件。请参阅下面的“ untie 陷阱”。

trans-unit.source: This is called when a stash is assigned to a new location in the symbol table.
trans-unit.target: 当一个储藏室被分配到符号表的一个新位置时,就会调用这个功能。

trans-unit.source: This is called when a stash is deleted from the symbol table.
trans-unit.target: 当从符号表中删除一个存储时,就会调用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: This is called when the hash is evaluated in scalar context, and in 5.28 onwards, by keys in boolean context. In order to mimic the behaviour of untied hashes, this method must return a value which when used as boolean, indicates whether the tied hash is considered empty. If this method does not exist, perl will make some educated guesses and return true when the hash is inside an iteration. If this isn't the case, FIRSTKEY is called, and the result will be a false value if FIRSTKEY returns the empty list, true otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 当在标量上下文中以及从5.28开始，通过布尔上下文中的 keys 对哈希值进行评估时，将调用此方法。为了模拟未绑定哈希的行为，此方法必须返回一个值，该值在用作布尔值时指示绑定的哈希是否被认为是空的。如果此方法不存在，则perl将进行一些有根据的猜测，并在哈希位于迭代内时返回true。如果不是这种情况，则调用FIRSTKEY，如果FIRSTKEY返回空列表，则结果将为false值，否则为true。

trans-unit.source: This is called when the hash is evaluated in scalar context. In order to mimic the behaviour of untied hashes, this method should return a false value when the tied hash is considered empty. If this method does not exist, perl will make some educated guesses and return true when the hash is inside an iteration. If this isn't the case, FIRSTKEY is called, and the result will be a false value if FIRSTKEY returns the empty list, true otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 当哈希在标量上下文中被评估时,会调用这个方法。为了模仿未绑定哈希的行为,当绑定哈希被认为是空的时候,这个方法应该返回一个false值。如果这个方法不存在,perl会做一些有根据的猜测,当哈希在迭代内部时返回true。如果不是这种情况,则调用FIRSTKEY,如果FIRSTKEY返回空列表,结果将是一个false值,否则为true。

trans-unit.source: This is caused by the fact that a block by itself acts as a loop that executes once, see "Basic BLOCKs".
trans-unit.target: 这是由于以下事实引起的：一个块本身就充当一次执行一次的循环，请参见“基本块”。

trans-unit.source: This is done primarily to avoid the problems Test::Builder had by exposing its singleton. We do not want anyone to replace this singleton, rebless it, or directly muck with its internals. If you need to do something and cannot because of the restrictions placed here, then please report it as an issue. If possible, we will create a way for you to implement your functionality without exposing things that should not be exposed.
trans-unit.target: 这样做主要是为了避免 Test::Builder 暴露其单体的问题。我们不希望任何人替换这个单例,重构它,或者直接对它的内部进行捣乱。如果你需要做一些事情,但因为这里的限制而不能做,那么请把它作为一个问题来报告。如果可能的话,我们将为你创造一种方法来实现你的功能,而不暴露不该暴露的东西。

trans-unit.source: This is due to a bug in the C library's printf routine. printf("'%e'", 0. ) produces '0.000000e+0', but ANSI requires '0.000000e+00'. QNX has acknowledged the bug.
trans-unit.target: 这是由于 C 库的 printf 例程出现了一个错误。printf("'%e'",0.)会生成 "0.000000e+0",但 ANSI 要求是 "0.000000e+00"。QNX 已承认这一错误。

trans-unit.source: This is due to the performance optimisation of using MULTICALL for the code block, which means that fresh SVs do not get allocated for each call to the block. Instead, the same SV is re-assigned for each iteration, and all the closures will share the value seen on the final iteration.
trans-unit.target: 这是由于对代码块使用 MULTICALL 进行了性能优化，这意味着不会为每次调用该块分配新的SV。取而代之的是，为每个迭代重新分配相同的SV，并且所有闭包将共享在最终迭代中看到的值。

trans-unit.source: This is easier that you might expect if you realise that all the IO::Compress::* objects are derived from IO::File and that all the IO::Uncompress::* modules can read from an IO::File filehandle.

trans-unit.source: This is fairly secure because /\w+/ doesn't normally match shell metacharacters, nor are dot, dash, or at going to mean something special to the shell. Use of /.+/ would have been insecure in theory because it lets everything through, but Perl doesn't check for that. The lesson is that when untainting, you must be exceedingly careful with your patterns. Laundering data using regular expression is the
trans-unit.target: 这是相当安全的，因为 /\w+/ 通常不匹配shell元字符，也不是点，破折号或对shell来说有些特殊的含义。 /.+/ 的使用在理论上是不安全的，因为它可以使所有内容通过，但是Perl不会对此进行检查。教训是，在取消污染时，必须格外小心。使用正则表达式清洗数据是

trans-unit.source: This is fine for systems programming when sendmail is known to be available. But it is not fine for many non-Unix systems, and even some Unix systems that may not have sendmail installed. If a portable solution is needed, see the various distributions on CPAN that deal with it. Mail::Mailer and Mail::Send in the MailTools distribution are commonly used, and provide several mailing methods, including mail, sendmail, and direct SMTP (via Net::SMTP) if a mail transfer agent is not available. Mail::Sendmail is a standalone module that provides simple, platform-independent mailing.
trans-unit.target: 当已知sendmail可用时，这对于系统编程是很好的。但是，对于许多非Unix系统，甚至某些可能未安装sendmail的Unix系统，它也不是很好。如果需要便携式解决方案，请参阅处理该解决方案的CPAN上的各种发行版。 Mail::Mailer 和 Mail::Send 在 MailTools 分布常用，并且提供多种通讯方式，包括 mail ， sendmail 的，和直接SMTP（通过 Net::SMTP ）如果一个邮件传输代理不可用。 Mail::Sendmail 是一个独立的模块，提供简单的，与平台无关的邮件。

Mail::Sendmail is a standalone module that provides simple, platform-independent mailing.

trans-unit.source: This is functionally identical to Perl's builtin sleep() function for suspending the execution of the current for process for certain number of seconds, see sleep. There is one significant difference, however: POSIX::sleep() returns the number of unslept seconds, while the CORE::sleep() returns the number of slept seconds.
trans-unit.target: 这在功能上与Perl的内置 sleep() 函数相同，该函数将进程的当前执行暂停一定的秒数，请参见sleep。有一个显著的差异，但是： POSIX::sleep() 返回的数量unslept秒，而 CORE::sleep() 返回睡觉的秒数。

trans-unit.source: This is functionally identical to Perl's builtin sleep() function for suspending the execution of the current for process for certain number of seconds, see "sleep" in perlfunc. There is one significant difference, however: POSIX::sleep() returns the number of unslept seconds, while the CORE::sleep() returns the number of slept seconds.
trans-unit.target: 这在功能上与Perl的内置 sleep() 函数相同，该函数将进程的当前执行暂停一定的秒数，请参阅perlfunc中的“ sleep”。有一个显著的差异，但是： POSIX::sleep() 返回的数量unslept秒，而 CORE::sleep() 返回睡觉的秒数。

trans-unit.source: This is grandfathered (for \1 to \9) for the RHS of a substitute to avoid shocking the sed addicts, but it's a dirty habit to get into. That's because in PerlThink, the righthand side of an s/// is a double-quoted string. \1 in the usual double-quoted string means a control-A. The customary Unix meaning of \1 is kludged in for s///. However, if you get into the habit of doing that, you get yourself into trouble if you then add an /e modifier.
trans-unit.target: 这是祖父级（用于\ 1 \ 9）的替代品的RHS避免震撼sed的吸毒者，但它是一个肮脏的习惯进入。这是因为在PerlThink中， s/// 的右侧是双引号字符串。通常的双引号字符串中的 \1 表示控件A。 \1 s/// 的惯用Unix含义为s ///。但是，如果您习惯这样做，那么在添加 /e 修饰符时就会遇到麻烦。

trans-unit.source: This is grandfathered (for \1 to \9) for the RHS of a substitute to avoid shocking the sed addicts, but it's a dirty habit to get into. That's because in PerlThink, the righthand side of an s/// is a double-quoted string. \1 in the usual double-quoted string means a control-A. The customary Unix meaning of \1 is kludged in for s///. However, if you get into the habit of doing that, you get yourself into trouble if you then add an /e modifier.
trans-unit.target: 这是祖父级（用于\ 1 \ 9）的替代品的RHS避免震撼sed的吸毒者，但它是一个肮脏的习惯进入。这是因为在PerlThink中， s/// 的右侧是双引号引起来的字符串。通常的双引号字符串中的 \1 表示控件A。 \1 s/// 的惯用Unix含义为s ///。但是，如果您习惯这样做，那么在添加 /e 修饰符时就会遇到麻烦。

trans-unit.target: 这对于输出格式不像“ S <...>”这样的输出格式非常方便，但是它们确实具有不间断空格的代码。

trans-unit.source: This is handy when you want to do a list assignment in a Boolean context, because most list functions return a null list when finished, which when assigned produces a 0, which is interpreted as FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 当你想在布尔上下文中进行列表赋值时,这很方便,因为大多数列表函数在完成赋值后都会返回一个空列表,当赋值后会产生一个0,解释为FALSE。
