trans-unit.source: This is how you add a global init callback. Global callbacks happen for every context for any hub or stack.
trans-unit.target: 这就是你添加全局init回调的方式。全局回调发生在任何枢纽或堆栈的每个上下文中。

trans-unit.source: This is how you add a global release callback. Global callbacks happen for every context for any hub or stack.
trans-unit.target: 这就是你如何添加全局释放回调。全局回调发生在任何枢纽或堆栈的每个上下文中。

trans-unit.source: This is how you add a release callback for all contexts created for a given hub. These callbacks will not run for other hubs.
trans-unit.target: 这是你为给定集线器创建的所有上下文添加释放回调的方式。这些回调不会为其他集线器运行。

trans-unit.source: This is how you add an init callback for all contexts created for a given hub. These callbacks will not run for other hubs.
trans-unit.target: 这是你为给定集线器创建的所有上下文添加init回调的方式。这些回调不会为其他集线器运行。

trans-unit.source: This is how you add release callbacks directly to a context. The callback will ALWAYS be added to the context that gets returned, it does not matter if a new one is generated, or if an existing one is returned.
trans-unit.target: 这是将发布回调直接添加到上下文中的方式。回调将始终添加到要返回的上下文中，无论是生成新的回调还是返回现有的回调都无关紧要。

trans-unit.source: This is how you specify an init hook that will only run if your call to context() generates a new context. The callback will be ignored if context() is returning an existing context.
trans-unit.target: 这是您指定一个初始化挂钩的方式，该挂钩仅在对 context() 的调用生成新上下文时才会运行。如果 context() 返回一个现有的上下文，则该回调将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function _exit() . It exits the program immediately which means among other things buffered I/O is not flushed.

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function _exit(). It exits the program immediately which means among other things buffered I/O is not flushed.

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function abort() . It terminates the process with a SIGABRT signal unless caught by a signal handler or if the handler does not return normally (it e.g. does a longjmp ).
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 abort() 相同。除非信号处理程序捕获到该处理程序或该处理程序未正常返回（例如， longjmp 会返回），否则它将以 SIGABRT 信号终止该过程。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function cosh(), for returning the hyperbolic cosine of its numeric argument. See also Math::Trig.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 cosh() 相同，用于返回其数字参数的双曲余弦值。另请参见Math :: Trig。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function ctime() and equivalent to asctime(localtime(...)) , see asctime and localtime.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 ctime() 相同，并且等效于 asctime(localtime(...)) ，请参见asctime和localtime。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function ctime() and equivalent to asctime(localtime(...)), see "asctime" and "localtime".
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 ctime() 相同，并且等效于 asctime(localtime(...)) ，请参见“ asctime”和“ localtime”。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function difftime() , for returning the time difference (in seconds) between two times (as returned by time()), see time.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 difftime() 相同，用于返回两次（由 time() 返回）之间的时间差（以秒为单位），请参见time。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function difftime(), for returning the time difference (in seconds) between two times (as returned by time()), see "time".
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 difftime() 相同，要返回两次（由 time() 返回）之间的时间差（以秒为单位），请参见“ time”。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function floor() , returning the largest integer value less than or equal to the numerical argument.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 floor() 相同，返回小于或等于数值参数的最大整数值。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function perror() , which outputs to the standard error stream the specified message followed by ": " and the current error string. Use the warn() function and the $! variable instead, see warn and $ERRNO in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 perror() 相同，该函数将指定的消息后跟 ": " 和当前错误字符串输出到标准错误流。使用 warn() 函数和 $! 而是改为查看warn和$ perlvar中的$ ERRNO。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function perror(), which outputs to the standard error stream the specified message followed by ": " and the current error string. Use the warn() function and the $! variable instead, see "warn" in perlfunc and "$ERRNO" in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 perror() 相同，该函数将指定的消息后跟 ": " 和当前错误字符串输出到标准错误流。使用 warn() 函数和 $! 变量，请参见perlfunc中的“警告”和perlvar中的“ $ ERRNO”。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function setsid() for setting the session identifier of the current process.
trans-unit.target: 这与用于设置当前进程的会话标识符的C函数 setsid() 相同。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function sinh() for returning the hyperbolic sine of the numerical argument. See also Math::Trig.
trans-unit.target: 这与用于返回数值参数的双曲正弦的C函数 sinh() 相同。另请参见Math :: Trig。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function sinh() for returning the hyperbolic sine of the numerical argument. See also Math::Trig.
trans-unit.target: 这与用于返回数值参数的双曲正弦的C函数 sinh() 相同。另请参见Math :: Trig。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function strcoll() for collating (comparing) strings transformed using the strxfrm() function. Not really needed since Perl can do this transparently, see perllocale.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 strcoll() 相同，用于整理（比较）使用 strxfrm() 函数转换的字符串。由于Perl可以透明地执行此操作，因此并不需要，请参见perllocale。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function tan() , returning the tangent of the numerical argument. See also Math::Trig.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 tan() 相同，返回数字参数的正切值。另请参见Math :: Trig。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function tan(), returning the tangent of the numerical argument. See also Math::Trig.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 tan() 相同，返回数字参数的正切值。另请参见Math :: Trig。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function tanh() , returning the hyperbolic tangent of the numerical argument. See also Math::Trig.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 tanh() 相同，返回数值参数的双曲正切值。另请参见Math :: Trig。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function tanh(), returning the hyperbolic tangent of the numerical argument. See also Math::Trig.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 tanh() 相同，返回数值参数的双曲正切值。另请参见Math :: Trig。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function tcgetpgrp() for returning the process group identifier of the foreground process group of the controlling terminal.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 tcgetpgrp() 相同，用于返回控制终端的前台进程组的进程组标识符。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function ttyname() for returning the name of the current terminal.
trans-unit.target: 这与用于返回当前终端名称的C函数 ttyname() 相同。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function tzset() for setting the current timezone based on the environment variable TZ , to be used by ctime() , localtime(), mktime() , and strftime() functions.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 tzset() 相同，后者基于环境变量 TZ 设置当前时区，由 ctime() ， localtime() ， mktime() 和 strftime() 函数使用。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function tzset() for setting the current timezone based on the environment variable TZ, to be used by ctime(), localtime(), mktime(), and strftime() functions.
trans-unit.target: 这与用于根据环境变量 TZ 设置当前时区的C函数 tzset() 相同，将由 ctime() ， localtime() ， mktime() 和 strftime() 函数使用。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function wcstombs() .
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 wcstombs() 相同。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function wctomb() .
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数 wctomb() 相同。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function, except that it can apply to a single character or to a whole string, and currently operates as if the locale always is "C". Consider using the lc() function, see lc, see lc, or the equivalent \L operator inside doublequotish strings.
trans-unit.target: 除了可以应用于单个字符或整个字符串之外，此功能与C函数相同，并且当前的运行方式就像语言环境始终为“ C”一样。考虑使用 lc() 函数，请参见lc，lc或双引号字符串中的等效 \L 运算符。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function, except the order of arguments is consistent with Perl's builtin chown() with the added restriction of only one path, not a list of paths. Does the same thing as the chown() function but changes the owner of a symbolic link instead of the file the symbolic link points to.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数相同，不同之处在于参数的顺序与Perl的内置 chown() 一致，只增加了一条路径，而不是路径列表。执行与 chown() 函数相同的操作，但是更改符号链接的所有者，而不是符号链接指向的文件。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the C function, except the order of arguments is consistent with Perl's builtin chown() with the added restriction of only one path, not a list of paths. Does the same thing as the chown() function but changes the owner of a symbolic link instead of the file the symbolic link points to.
trans-unit.target: 这与C函数相同，不同之处在于参数的顺序与Perl的内置 chown() 一致，只是增加了对一个路径的限制，而不是对路径列表的限制。执行与 chown() 函数相同的操作，但是更改符号链接的所有者，而不是符号链接指向的文件。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the DL_FUNCS attribute available via MakeMaker, from which it is usually taken. Its value is a reference to an associative array, in which each key is the name of a package, and each value is an a reference to an array of function names which should be exported by the extension. For instance, one might say DL_FUNCS => { Homer::Iliad => [ qw(trojans greeks) ], Homer::Odyssey => [ qw(travellers family suitors) ] } . The function names should be identical to those in the XSUB code; Mksymlists will alter the names written to the linker option file to match the changes made by
trans-unit.target: 该属性与通常通过MakeMaker获得的DL_FUNCS属性相同。它的值是对关联数组的引用，其中每个键是包的名称，每个值是对应由扩展名导出的函数名称的数组的引用。例如，有人可能会说 DL_FUNCS => { Homer::Iliad => [ qw(trojans greeks) ], Homer::Odyssey => [ qw(travellers family suitors) ] } 。函数名称应与XSUB代码中的名称相同； Mksymlists 将更改写入链接器选项文件的名称，以匹配由

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the DL_FUNCS attribute available via MakeMaker, from which it is usually taken. Its value is a reference to an associative array, in which each key is the name of a package, and each value is an a reference to an array of function names which should be exported by the extension. For instance, one might say DL_FUNCS => { Homer::Iliad => [ qw(trojans greeks) ], Homer::Odyssey => [ qw(travellers family suitors) ] }. The function names should be identical to those in the XSUB code; Mksymlists will alter the names written to the linker option file to match the changes made by
trans-unit.target: 该属性与通常通过MakeMaker获得的DL_FUNCS属性相同。它的值是对关联数组的引用，其中每个键是包的名称，每个值是对应由扩展名导出的函数名称的数组的引用。例如，有人可能会说 DL_FUNCS => { Homer::Iliad => [ qw(trojans greeks) ], Homer::Odyssey => [ qw(travellers family suitors) ] } 。函数名称应与XSUB代码中的名称相同； Mksymlists 将更改写入链接器选项文件的名称，以匹配由

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the DL_VARS attribute available via MakeMaker, and, like DL_FUNCS, it is usually specified via MakeMaker. Its value is a reference to an array of variable names which should be exported by the extension.
trans-unit.target: 这与通过MakeMaker提供的DL_VARS属性相同,和DL_FUNCS一样,它通常通过MakeMaker来指定。它的值是对一个变量名数组的引用,该数组应该由扩展程序导出。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the macro isUTF8_CHAR.
trans-unit.target: 这与宏isUTF8_CHAR相同。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the macro "isUTF8_CHAR" in perlapi.
trans-unit.target: 这与perlapi中的宏“ isUTF8_CHAR”相同。

trans-unit.source: This is ignored by most formatters, but some may use it for building indexes. It always renders as empty-string. Example: X<absolutizing relative URLs>
trans-unit.target: 大多数格式化程序都忽略了它，但是有些格式化程序可以将其用于建立索引。它始终呈现为空字符串。示例： X<absolutizing relative URLs>

trans-unit.source: This is implemented as a macro.
trans-unit.target: 这是作为一个宏来实现的。

trans-unit.source: This is important because miniperl, used to build XS modules in the core, can not load XS.
trans-unit.target: 这一点很重要,因为用于在核心中构建XS模块的miniperl不能加载XS。

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to many other dynamic languages, where the operation is determined by the type of the first argument. It also means that Perl has two versions of some operators, one for numeric and one for string comparison. For example $x == $y compares two numbers for equality, and $x eq $y compares two strings.
trans-unit.target: 这与许多其他动态语言相反，后者的操作由第一个参数的类型确定。这也意味着Perl有两种​​版本的某些运算符，一种用于数字运算，另一种用于字符串比较。例如， $x == $y 比较两个数字是否相等，而 $x eq $y 比较两个字符串。

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to many other dynamic languages, where the operation is determined by the type of the first argument. It also means that Perl has two versions of some operators, one for numeric and one for string comparison. For example $x == $y compares two numbers for equality, and $x eq $y compares two strings.
trans-unit.target: 这与许多其他动态语言相反，后者的操作由第一个参数的类型确定。这也意味着Perl有两种​​版本的某些运算符，一种用于数字运算，另一种用于字符串比较。例如， $x == $y 比较两个数字是否相等，而 $x eq $y 比较两个字符串。

trans-unit.source: This is independent of other methods (except that it operates after any verbatim input stripping is done).
trans-unit.target: 这是独立于其他方法的(除了它的操作是在任何逐字输入剥离完成后)。

trans-unit.source: This is indexed by op name and then bit number (0..7). For single bit flags, it returns the name of the define (if any) for that bit:
trans-unit.target: 这是以操作名称和位数(0...7)为索引的。对于单个位标志,它返回该位的定义名称(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: This is intended as a shortcut that lets you release your context and return a value in one statement. This function will get your context, and an optional return value. It will release your context, then return your value. Scalar context is always assumed.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个快捷方式,可以让你在一个语句中释放你的上下文并返回一个值。这个函数将获取你的上下文和一个可选的返回值。它将释放你的上下文,然后返回你的值。标量上下文总是被假定的。

trans-unit.source: This is intended for authors of modules which do lots of class introspection, as it allows them to very quickly check if anything important about the local properties of a given class have changed since the last time they looked. It does not increment on method/@ISA changes in superclasses.
trans-unit.target: 这适用于进行大量类自省的模块的作者，因为它使他们可以非常快速地检查自上次查看以来与给定类的局部属性有关的任何重要事项是否已更改。它不会在超类中的方法/ @ @ISA 更改上增加。

trans-unit.source: This is intended to be a human readable summary of the event. This should ideally only be one line long, but you can use multiple lines if necessary. This is intended for human consumption. You do not need to make it easy for machines to understand.
trans-unit.target: 这是对事件的可读性总结。最好只有一行,但必要时可使用多行。这是为了供人类使用。您不需要让机器容易理解。

trans-unit.source: This is intended to be called in an END { ... } block. This will look at test state and set $?. This will also call any end callbacks, and wait on child processes/threads.
trans-unit.target: 它打算在 END { ... } 块中调用。这将查看测试状态并设置$?。这还将调用任何结束回调，并等待子进程/线程。

trans-unit.source: This is intended to largely replace the deprecated pseudo-hashes.
trans-unit.target: 这在很大程度上是为了取代被废弃的伪哈希值。

trans-unit.source: This is invalid because every "=end" command must have a formatname parameter.
trans-unit.target: 这是无效的,因为每条"=end "命令都必须有一个formatname参数。

trans-unit.source: This is just a basic proof of concept. It should be seriously expanded to support configurable coloration via options passed to the constructor, and pod2text should be taught about those.
trans-unit.target: 这只是概念的基本证明。应该认真地扩展它，以通过传递给构造函数的选项来支持可配置的着色，并且应该教pod2text有关这些内容。

trans-unit.source: This is just a beta release -- there are a good number of things still left to do. Notably, support for EBCDIC platforms is still half-done, an untested.
trans-unit.target: 这只是一个测试版--还有很多事情没有做。值得注意的是,对EBCDIC平台的支持仍然是半成品,是一个未经测试的。

trans-unit.source: This is just a quick start guide. For a more in-depth tutorial on regexes, see perlretut and for the reference page, see perlre.
trans-unit.target: 这只是一个快速入门指南。有关正则表达式的更深入的教程，请参见perlretut；对于参考页面，请参见perlre。

trans-unit.source: This is just a restatement of the previous section. Unless you are completely certain you know what you are doing, avoid mixing filtered & non-filtered data.
trans-unit.target: 这只是上一节的重述。除非您完全确定自己知道自己在做什么，否则请避免混合使用已过滤和未过滤的数据。
